programme.title: Shoot the Living and Pray for the Dead
programme.desc: After Dan Hogan and his gang rob a bank, they hire a mysterious man to guide them across the Mexican border in return for half of the loot.

programme.title: Wyatt Earp S01E33-35
programme.desc: In one of televisions first adult Westerns, the famous marshal puts his life on the line to maintain order, first in Dodge City, Kan., then in Tombstone, Ariz.

programme.title: Cry Blood Apache
programme.desc: Gang of sadistic cowboys let nothing stand in their way in their search for gold.

programme.title: Django, Prepare a Coffin
programme.desc: A gunfighter forms a gang of "deceased" execution victims to get revenge on the politician and outlaw who killed his wife.

programme.title: A Lust to Kill
programme.desc: A cowboy escapes from jail with the help of his girlfriend, and goes after the men he believes are responsible for his brother being shot down by lawmen.

programme.title: The Animals
programme.desc: A woman tracks down the three men who raped her, helped by an Apache. Traveling through the Old West to her new home, young schoolteacher Alice McAndrew is abducted by five outlaws headed by robber Pudge Elliott. The thugs rape Alice before leaving her for dead, but she is rescued by Chatto, an Apache chief. He restores her health and aids her in her bloodthirsty quest for revenge. With her sanity wavering, will Alice be able to find the men who tortured her?

programme.title: Killer Goodbye
programme.desc: A young man goes back to his hometown ten years after killing the killer of his parents. Once there he is asked to help the sheriff.

programme.title: Bounty Hunter in Trinity
programme.desc: The townsfolk of Trinity decide to hire a notorious bounty hunter to protect them from a fierce band of Mexican outlaws who are terrorizing the area.

programme.title: Sugar Colt
programme.desc: In order to avenge a friend and to fulfill his last wish, Rocco has to find out what happened to an army corps that has mysteriously disappeared. He therefore puts on the disguise of a doctor and starts investigating in a somewhat uncomfortable town.

programme.title: Beyond The Law
programme.desc: A trio of thieves plot to steal a towns silver shipment but a turn of events makes them the towns heroes.

programme.title: $100,000 for a Killing
programme.desc: $100,000 for a Killing - Johnny Forest, bounty hunter, attempts to carry out his mothers dying wish that he bring in his outlaw brother, Clint, alive.

programme.title: The Man from Utah
programme.desc: In a horse-riding rodeo contest bad guys want John Weston to lose. When he doesnt go along they add some insurance: a poisoned needle just under his saddle.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman
programme.desc: Old Western Movie starring John Wayne: Angel and the Badman - Quirt Evans, an all round bad guy, is nursed back to health and sought after by Penelope Worth, a Quaker girl. He eventually finds himself having to choose between his world and the world Penelope lives in.

programme.title: The Godless Ones
programme.desc: An outlaw and a bounty hunter are searching for Mexican bandit Corbancho, who is running the El Paso area, and has also robbed the Bank of Tuscon of $400,000.

programme.title: Gunfighters Die Harder
programme.desc: Crooked bankers plan an insurance swindle and hire a Mexican gang to steal the banks gold but they also pay Laskys gang to kill the Mexicans.

programme.title: Shadow of Sartana
programme.desc: Sartana has a bounty on his head and hes wanted dead or alive. To eliminate this he makes a deal with the local politicians. If he hunts down the marauding Randal Brothers, the bounty will be removed.

programme.title: Wyatt Earp S01E29-32
programme.desc: In one of televisions first adult Westerns, the famous marshal puts his life on the line to maintain order, first in Dodge City, Kan., then in Tombstone, Ariz.

programme.title: Requiem for a Gringo
programme.desc: A unique Euro-western with the hero as an astrologist who wears a leopard suit.

programme.title: The Star Packer
programme.desc: A gang working for The Shadow is terrorizing the town. John Travers decides to take on the job of sheriff and do something about it.

programme.title: Return of Shanghai Joe
programme.desc: A sinister town boss called Pat Barnes has exploited almost everyone in the town.

programme.title: Promise
programme.desc: Ransom, a retired scout, must face his tragic past to find peace. Seeking answers about his lost love Tess and her daughter Promise, he learns of a hidden cash box tied to his past. As ex-Confederates and the dangerous Wildeye hunt for the treasure, Ransom and Promise join forces, navigating gunfights, betrayal, and an intense showdown.

programme.title: Texas, Adios
programme.desc: A Texas sheriff and his younger brother travel across the Mexican border to confront the man who killed their father.

programme.title: Sabata the Killer
programme.desc: Sabata and Mangosta are bank robbers, who after a bank job, through a series of events, end up teaming up with the bank clerk, Peter. They then go on the run with Peters boss and a hired posse equipped with the latest technology in weapons on their trail.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks
programme.desc: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.

programme.title: Panhandle
programme.desc: John Sands, a former Texas marshal turned fugitive, hides in Mexico after his gun skills made him an outlaw. When he learns his brother Billy, a crusading newspaperman, has been murdered in Sentinel, Texas, John risks his life to return north. Despite the bounty on his head, he’s determined to uncover the truth and avenge his brother’s death.

programme.title: Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: In 1854, Jeb Stuart, George Custer and other graduates from West Point are posted to Kansas to help pacify the territory before railroad construction to Santa Fe can resume.

programme.title: Massacre
programme.desc: A gang of gunrunners is pursued by Mexican Rurales and Yaqui Indians. The police want to stop the tribes from attacking farmers, while the Yaqui seek revenge for bad medicine that blinded their children. Both groups capture the criminals but find themselves trapped by angry tribes at a ruined mission. Can cops and criminals unite to survive?

programme.title: Belle Starrs Daughter
programme.desc: The daughter of famous outlaw Belle Starr arrives at the town where her mother was murdered to find her killer.

programme.title: Gunman of One Hundred Crosses
programme.desc: An Irishman is killed in the wild West. His son Jimmy goes out searching for the killers of his father, but is soon ambushed by two highwaymen, and killed, too.

programme.title: Django Challenges Sartana
programme.desc: Framed for a bank robbery, bounty killer Djangos brother, Steve is lynched.

programme.title: Gun Duel in Durango
programme.desc: Ex-outlaw Will Sabre wants an honest life under the alias Dan Tomlinson but his old gang, under new leader Dunsten, wants him back for a new string of armed robberies.

programme.title: Gustos QR Countdown
programme.desc: Unlock Gusto TVs top recipes on QR Countdown! Thousands of viewers scan our QR codes to access our delicious dishes. Now, were serving up 8 of our most popular cornbread recipes, from hosts like Natalia Machado and Spencer Watts.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Hong Kong Foodie Favourites
programme.desc: Cantonese expert Mary Tang showcases traditional dishes from the Chinese coastal territory, Hong Kong. To kick off the episode, Mary rolls up and steams a batch of fluffy Shrimp Dumplings. Next, tender beef with chewy rice noodles and fermented black beans is on the menu. This dish is doused in a fun and tasty dressing featuring salty soy sauce, tart Shaoxing wine, sweet oyster sauce, and a medley of spices. With a sturdy clay pot, Mary then cooks up some savoury Chinese sausage and lays it on a bed of aromatic rice. To top it off, why not some delicious Pineapple Buns? These buns are pillowy and sweet; youll be surprised to hear that they contain zero pineapple!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Simple, fun, and magically tasty, some of Vietnams most delicious and well-known foods come from its capital city of Hanoi. Vietnamese expert Lisa Nguyen shares her knowledge of Hanoi dishes by starting off with a sweet, sour, and spicy papaya salad called Goi Du Du. With a popular nuoc cham dressing featuring sugar, lime juice and Thai chili drizzled over a medley of crunchy carrots, fresh cilantro and mint, chewy papaya, and shrimp, this dish is the perfect balance of wonderful flavours and textures. Also on the menu, grilled-to-perfection Pork Patties with a rich caramel sauce. Fresh fragrant dill and golden turmeric elevate Lisas next dish as she cooks up some mahi-mahi to enjoy...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E18 Nuts about Walnuts, Pine Nuts and Pistachios
programme.desc: Nuts are a staple in Lebanon - they add depth of flavour and make dishes more hearty. Talented home cook Jasmin Ibrahim shows us a unique Lebanese dish that is traditionally made in the dead of winter - Winter Tabbouleh. With no fresh herbs or vegetables, this crunchy nut, feta, and tasty bulgur salad will get you through a long winter night. Next, she makes a simmering beef tortellini with toasted pine nuts in a hot, tangy yoghurt sauce. She then cooks up tender Celebration Lamb showered in three kinds of tasty nuts; its great for sharing at special occasions. To finish off, Jasmin prepares some delicious walnut-filled Lebanese Pancakes doused in sweet rose water - yum! Ditch the...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E25 From the Island of Crete
programme.desc: Greek expert Joanna Chery showcases unique recipes from the island of Crete. To start, she whips up a creamy Cretan Meat Pie. Sweet ricotta, tender lamb, and an aromatic bundle of spices covered in a flaky Greek yoghurt pie dough might be the best Greek comfort food. Next, Joanna makes Grouper with Okra - a light and healthy dish featuring flaky sea bass, fresh okra, and delicious potatoes. Then, she prepares a dish thats traditionally served at weddings - Gamopilafo. Its a fluffy, citrusy, rice pilaf topped with crispy, juicy chicken that will have you going back for seconds! For dessert, a popular Cretan treat called Baklava. Joanna expertly layers crispy, golden-brown phyllo pastry...

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Portugal, Argentina, India, Japan
programme.desc: Chef Pino Di Cerbo creates veggie dishes inspired by Portugal, Argentina, India, and Japan!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Host Vijaya Selvaraju makes delectable Indian dishes using versatile Indian spices and flavours.

programme.title: VegHeadz
programme.desc: Nothing screams summer more than salsa, especially chef Pinos sunshine yellow salsa served with grilled halloumi cheese. Yes, please! Next up, snappy snow peas pair with summer strawberries in a sprouted quinoa salad with Champagne vinaigrette! Pino then takes summer sunbathing to the next level, serving up blistered Shishito peppers and buttery radishes with sesame seeds and edible seaweed! For his final dish, Pino sums up summer with a French-style ratatouille served as a salad! Thinly sliced vegetables are lightly marinated before pairing with a fresh carrot puree in a dish that sparkles with summer.

programme.title: Pressures On
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Weeknight Dishes made in Little Thyme
programme.desc: Who has "thyme" to make dinner after a hectic day? Host Vanessa Gianfrancesco inspires with four recipes including a Mushroom Thyme Risotto.

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: Onions, cheese, bread, soup, four elements that live in harmony, especially in this episode of Up the Dish! Poppy Sandler starts off in Paris - classic French Onion Soup with sweet, caramelized onions and melty Comte cheese, with perfect rounds of toasted baguette. Poppy passes it over to Micah Trainor, who doesnt miss a beat; her Tenderloin Roast with Sherry Braised Shallots is sweet, savoury, and bursting with flavour. Tiera Singh takes a chive-y dive into the vegetarian side with her Chive Pesto Pasta - dont worry, the pesto is totally customizable! Missy Hui has the showstopper, Scallion Ash Carrots and Parsnips, and its a five-star treatment that takes the simple to spectacular!...

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Papaya Salad, Carrot Hog Dogs, Squid, and Tofu
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, green papaya salad with crispy pork! Next, BBQ carrot hot dogs! Followed by grilled squid steak! Finishing with Korean BBQ tofu!

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Whether for a small family dinner or a big backyard barbeque, host Spencer Watts shows us the best ways to grill up tasty duck, turkey, capon, and quail.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Sides and Sweets with Heat
programme.desc: Never underestimate the power of a good side or dessert! Fun host Spencer Watts grills up the perfect sides and treats for your next barbeque.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Host Mary Tang shows us some easy Chinese take-out dishes that are a true "wok" in the park! First, she rolls up some juicy wontons to douse in a bowl of hot seasoned chicken broth and delicious bok choy for a Chinese classic - Wonton Soup. Next, she gets out her frying pan for a crispy bowl of flavourful Chicken Chow Mein with egg noodles, savoury browned chicken, crunchy snow peas, and tasty baby corn. For an even simpler dish (and fan favourite), she then cooks up a hearty dish of Beef and Broccoli. Finally, Mary plays on different flavours with her Sweet and Sour Pork. Marinated pork cubes fried in a wonderful wok with fragrant garlic and ginger, sweet and tart red and green peppers,...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Vietnams Love for Noodles
programme.desc: Noodles are a staple in Vietnamese cooking and host Lisa Nguyen showcases their versatility by starting off with fine vermicelli Stuffed Squid. Beautifully grilled and charred, these squid make great finger food. Lisa sticks to stuffing with her next dish - a Vietnamese favourite, Spring Rolls. Crunchy on the outside and filled with soft glass noodles, juicy ground pork, tender shrimp, and delectable crab meat on the inside, youre sure to be salivating at the sight of these tasty creations. Next on the menu, a Crispy Egg Noodle Pillow with a medley of vegetables and sauces on top. Lisa then finishes with a fun seafood and tomato soup; make sure you try the yummy shrimp and delightful...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Pork was Made for Barbeques
programme.desc: Pork and the grill are good buddies and host Spencer Watts shows us four of his favourite pork recipes that will have you salivating.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Fun and quirky host Chef Spencer Watts kicks off this episode by showing off his knife skills as he sabres a pineapple to start his instant classic; Grilled Fruit Salad. The pineapple joins a mix of bright summer fruits on the grill, then berries, spicy citrus vinaigrette and savoury feta cheese. Next up, Spencer whips up his Hawaiian Chicken recipe. Spiced with cayenne and Chinese five spice, Spencer stuffs flavourful chicken thighs with pineapple and grills it with a delightful ginger and soy sauce. Every bite is sweet, savoury, and fresh - exactly how summer should taste! Then Spencer shares his top tips for adding smoky flavours to pork using an easy and handy smoke pouch. His Apple...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Allium in the Family
programme.desc: Onions, green onions, chives, garlic, and leeks are all members of the same fabulous flowering family, Allium! First up? Chef Watts shows us his sweet and smoky Charred Leeks with Romesco; add grilled toast and you have your next party appetizer! Next up is a main course. Spencer starts with a juicy grilled pork chop, then adds roasted garlic melted into a balsamic onion chutney to make his out-of-this-world Roasted Garlic Pork Chops. Looking for a crowd pleaser thats easy to make? Spencer has a recipe for that! Chicken Yakitori. He threads skewers with crunchy green onions and tender chicken and caramelizes the yakitori sauce as he grills this tasty dish. Are you ready to drool? Spencer...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Have a cheese lover coming over? Blow their minds with some of Spencers "grate" barbecued cheese recipes! First up, Spencer chars Brie Cheese to an ooey-gooey perfection and tops it with tart cherries and crunchy walnuts, serving it with crispy grilled crostinis. Next up is a Grilled Steak and Caesar with a twist only Spencer could add - grilled... lettuce! Then, Spencer uses the classic German "hasselback" presentation to stuff chicken breasts with verdant spinach, yummy Swiss cheese and pungent sun- dried tomatoes, grilling them to melty perfection. Finally, Spencer fires up his barbecue to make his Grilled Peaches with Salted Bourbon Caramel, a decadent dessert elevated with creamy...

programme.title: VegHeadz
programme.desc: Chef Pino Di Cerbo begins his cruciferous crusade with a hearty bowl of broccoli and cauliflower soup, topped with toasted florets and finished with a hit of spicy black mustard. Then he mixes tender confit kohlrabi with some fresh and saucy kohlrabi to create a salad. Next up is a soba noodle stir fry, combining daikon radish with shiitake, scallions, and sesame. Lastly, chef Pino puts together some fluffy frittata-style muffins packed with tomato and spicy arugula leaves. Bravo brassicas!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Bursts of Japanese Flavours
programme.desc: Host Hana Etsuke Dethlefsen makes casual Japanese cuisine like Savoury Japanese Pancakes and Gyoza three-ways.

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: How many ways can salmon be prepared? Up the Dish is on a mission to find out! Tiera Singhs Salmon Salad NiÃ§oise is a staple of the French Riviera with shallot, eggs, and haricot verts, but she swaps out the tuna for luxuriant olive oil poached salmon - it may not be traditional but it sure tastes good! Poppy Sandler smokes the competition with a buttery Smoked Salmon Omelette, garnished with fresh chives and earthy goat cheese. Next, Micah Trainor skips the salmon but keeps the veggies for her steamed Tofu Nori Dim Sum Dumplings, with tart gingERS-pickled shallots and tons of green goodness. Missy Hui has the big finish; her Salmon with Bearnaise is cooked sous vide for a precisely...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: If you are talking about Irish food, its hard not to talk about Corned Beef and Cabbage. On this episode of CombiNATION Plates, Chef Craig Wong delivers his unusual take using Beef Cheek, modern technique, and a caraway-infused Carrot Terrine for fun! Next up is a tribute to Izakaya eats, featuring Tare Grilled Duck Hearts, Miso-roasted Mushroom, and Agedashi Tofu. The featured common ingredient is Oysters. For Ireland, its Garlic GratineÌe; for Japan, check out the Kaki Yaki, oysters broiled with miso and rich Japanese Kewpie mayo. For the final dish, light up! Smoking is permitted! Check out blowtorch-seared and tableside-smoked Wagyu Beef, brushed with Irish Stout Teriyaki and...

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: In this episode of Up the Dish, host Missy Hui goes back to her childhood with Chicken and Dumplings - comfort food for every age! The chicken-dumpling journey doesnt end there; Micah Trainor turns the dish upside down and inside out with her Chinese-inspired Chicken-Chive Gyoza, a crunchy-crispy dim sum delight, with an ovERS-the-top chili sauce! How does Poppy Sandler spice things up? Herb Gnudi with Red Pepper Sauce, a spicy-savoury dumpling thats coated in nutty brown butter and creamy ricotta cheese for extra oomph. Tiera Singh finishes with another European dish - Spinach Spaetzle and Crispy Prosciutto, straight from Germany! Chewy spaetzle, fresh spinach, crispy ham - this...

programme.title: Zach Kinda Cooks
programme.desc: Lazy and curmudgeonly chef and ex-Gusto writer Zach cooks one of his all-time favorite dishes – Mexican Lasagna! While cooking, he tells aimless stories, cracks bad jokes, and berates Sydney, the beleaguered camera person.

programme.title: Bonacinis Italy
programme.desc: Piemonte cuisine is influenced by its mountainous terrain. Chef Michael Bonacini shows us how to make its warm regional dishes like Bagna Cauda.

programme.title: Bring On The Karbs
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Chefs Erica and Josh Karbelnik go head-to-head to see who can come up with the most tantalizing dinner! Josh makes risotto negro, cauliflower bravas, and grilled flank steak while Erica prepares oysters, a veggie board, and braised chicken!

programme.title: Generation Cooks
programme.desc: Aspiring kid Chefs make sushi and test kitchen hacks, Liam whips up his favorite dessert – lemon bars, while Jae-Anthony and his father Wendell make BBQ chicken thighs!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E27 Cheese with Every Meal!
programme.desc: Cheese - a staple in traditional Greek cuisine! Talented home cook Joanna Chery fries up two delicious ap- petizers called Saganaki, both featuring two different types of cheese. First, she fries up kefaltyri, a hard, salty cheese in a dramatic burning flame of ouzo (licorice-flavoured alcohol) - Opa! Then, Joanna shows us a popular Fried Shrimp and Cheese appetizer using tasty feta and tender shrimp. Pair both dishes with a Greek rustic bread and youve nailed it! Next up, Joanna prepares a Greek classic - Spanakopita. This mouth-watering dish is made up of creamy ricotta, crispy phyllo pastry, fresh spinach, and a hint of dill (yum!). Moving on, Joanna showcases her all-time favourite...

programme.title: Spice Secrets
programme.desc: On this sweet episode of Spice Secrets, chef/hosts Jasmin Ibrahim and Shahir Massoud cook three dishes that all represent the sweeter side of cooking with spice, though not in the way youd expect! Youll never see donuts the same way again after trying Chocolate-Glazed Coriander Donuts"... with a Cilantro-Lime filling! Next, Asian Spring Rolls and Plum Sauce meet both Spanish Smoky and Hungarian Sweet Paprikas! Finally, a truly unique dish that can only be described as Duck Meets Vanilla.

programme.title: Lets Brunch
programme.desc: Looking for a brunch that gets past the usual old eggs and bacon rut? Check out Vanessas amazing Vegan Brunch ideas!

programme.title: Gustos QR Countdown
programme.desc: Unlock Gusto TVs top recipes on QR Countdown! Thousands of viewers scan our QR codes to access our delicious dishes. Now, were serving up 8 of our most recipes with beans, from hosts like Pino De Cirbo and Vanessa Gianfrancesco.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: In this bacon loving episode, Chef Spencer delivers a tasty Bacon Weave Turkey Breast, which gets injected with beer and spices before being wrapped up in its cozy bacon blanket and sent off to the grill! Next up? A Peameal Bacon Roast with Rosti. This heavy hunk of back bacon gets smoked to flavourful perfection while Chef Watts makes the crispiest golden-fried-to-perfection potato pancake. Then, Spencer whips up a charry, grilled, super decadent, bacon-wrapped and bacon stuffed cheeseburger. Spencer isnt finished with bacon yet! For his final recipe, Spencer stuffs an apple with decadent crispy morsels stuffed along with savoury caramelized onions and melty cheddar cheese.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: This episode kicks off with Spencers tasty Grilled Caesar Salad. He skillfully piles of char-grilled romaine lettuce wedges and sourdough croutons are topped with tangy dressing, crispy pancetta, and shards of a homemade parmesan tuile. For his next recipe, Spencer whips up Grilled Zucchini Boats that filled with fresh ingredients including orzo pasta, summer veggies, and herbs. Chef Watts loves a good steak and his Grilled Cauliflower Steak is not one to be passed up! Dusted in Middle Eastern Spices, flame roasted and served with chili-spiked, Yemeni Skhug hot sauce and pomegranate seeds. Finally, Spencer steams tender artichokes, stuffing these flowers with breadcrumbs and...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: The most liked post on any grill-masters social feed is meat on a stick - and Chef Spencers Turkish-style chicken kabob is worth every click! He marinates thick juicy chicken morsels in yogurt and spices, and then grills these flavourful skewers to a charry perfection. Next up is the creative Tornado Potato which re- invents grilled potatoes with a wild presentation and a trio of toppings. Spencer then assembles Char Siu Sliders on tiny party- ready buns. Stuffed with a soy, honey and umami-packed hoisin lacquered slow-and-low grilled pork belly, these tasty little sliders will have your taste buds tingling. For his final recipe, Spencer whips up toasted crispy roti cups; topping...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Chef Spencer starts this spicy barbeque episode with flavours from Thailand with a Bok Choy with a Ginger Chili Sauce. Powerful birds eye chilies are packed into a sweet and spicy sauce and served over tasty grilled bok choy. Spencer then introduces us to Calabrian chilies, mashed into a spice paste and rubbed on butterflied chicken that then gets grilled to flame-kissed perfection. Next, Spencer gives fresh calamari some heat with Korean chilies that add their distinctive heat and flavour before grilling this scrumptious recipe and serving it over a comforting bed of rice and peas. Finally, Spencer prepares Seekh Kabobs, made with ground lamb spiked with punchy dried Kashmiri chilies...

programme.title: Bonacinis Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini cooks up classic dishes like Mint Fava Bean Soup and Amaretti Cake from the well-known Lazio region of Italy.

programme.title: Generation Cooks
programme.desc: Aspiring kid Chefs make sushi and test kitchen hacks, Liam whips up his favorite dessert – lemon bars, while Jae-Anthony and his father Wendell make BBQ chicken thighs!

programme.title: Gustos QR Countdown
programme.desc: Unlock Gusto TVs top recipes on QR Countdown! Thousands of viewers scan our QR codes to access our delicious dishes. Now, were serving up 8 of our most popular recipes featuring bananas!

programme.title: LIVEFEED
programme.desc: A live experience featuring the busy kitchen staff of El Camino, a popular Mexican restaurant.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Lovely host Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen shows us how to make two of the most popular Japanese foods at home: sushi and tempura.

programme.title: VegHeadz
programme.desc: Chef Pino Di Cerbo begins his cruciferous crusade with a hearty bowl of broccoli and cauliflower soup, topped with toasted florets and finished with a hit of spicy black mustard. Then he mixes tender confit kohlrabi with some fresh and saucy kohlrabi to create a salad. Next up is a soba noodle stir fry, combining daikon radish with shiitake, scallions, and sesame. Lastly, chef Pino puts together some fluffy frittata-style muffins packed with tomato and spicy arugula leaves. Bravo brassicas!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Bursts of Japanese Flavours
programme.desc: Host Hana Etsuke Dethlefsen makes casual Japanese cuisine like Savoury Japanese Pancakes and Gyoza three-ways.

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: How many ways can salmon be prepared? Up the Dish is on a mission to find out! Tiera Singhs Salmon Salad NiÃ§oise is a staple of the French Riviera with shallot, eggs, and haricot verts, but she swaps out the tuna for luxuriant olive oil poached salmon - it may not be traditional but it sure tastes good! Poppy Sandler smokes the competition with a buttery Smoked Salmon Omelette, garnished with fresh chives and earthy goat cheese. Next, Micah Trainor skips the salmon but keeps the veggies for her steamed Tofu Nori Dim Sum Dumplings, with tart gingERS-pickled shallots and tons of green goodness. Missy Hui has the big finish; her Salmon with Bearnaise is cooked sous vide for a precisely...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: If you are talking about Irish food, its hard not to talk about Corned Beef and Cabbage. On this episode of CombiNATION Plates, Chef Craig Wong delivers his unusual take using Beef Cheek, modern technique, and a caraway-infused Carrot Terrine for fun! Next up is a tribute to Izakaya eats, featuring Tare Grilled Duck Hearts, Miso-roasted Mushroom, and Agedashi Tofu. The featured common ingredient is Oysters. For Ireland, its Garlic GratineÌe; for Japan, check out the Kaki Yaki, oysters broiled with miso and rich Japanese Kewpie mayo. For the final dish, light up! Smoking is permitted! Check out blowtorch-seared and tableside-smoked Wagyu Beef, brushed with Irish Stout Teriyaki and...

programme.title: Arlington Road
programme.desc: Michael Faraday on katkera FBI:n agenttina toimineen vaimonsa kuolemasta. Han asuu poikansa Grantin kanssa rauhallisella esikaaupunkialueella, jossa he tutustuvat miellyttaviin naapureihinsa Oliver ja Cheryl Langiin. Ystavyyden syventyessa Michael alkaa epailemaan naapureidensa todellista taustaa ja uskoo loytaneensa yhteyksia terrorismiin.

programme.title: Palo Alto
programme.desc: April on lukioikainen tytto, jonka arkea rytmittaa koulun lisaksi jalkapallotreenit ja kavereiden jarjestamat bileet. Varautuneen ja hiljaisen ulkokuoren alle katkeytyy haaveilijasielu, jonka aani ei aina kantaudu hottoisan aidin tai eksentrisen isapuolen korviin. Romanssin ontuessa lukiokaveri Teddyyn kipina tuntuu kuitenkin loytyvan Aprilin ja taman jalkapallovalmentajan yhteisista hetkista.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: Hortense Cumberbatch on keskiluokkainen lontoolainen ja menestyksekas optikko. Adoptioaitinsa kuoleman jalkeen han paattaa etsia biologisia juuriaan. Tummaihoinen Hortense yllattyy suuresti saadessaan selville, etta hanen biologinen aitinsa on valkoinen yhteiskunnan laitamille ajautunut tyolaisnainen. Uuden perheensa kanssa vietetty aika muuttaa Hortensea pysyvasti. Salaisuuksia ja valheita kahmi huikeat viisi Oscar-ehdokkuutta, ja se on yksi Mike Leighn menestyksekkaimpia elokuvia. Se palkittiin Cannesin Kultaisella palmulla, Golden Globella ja kolmella Baftalla.

programme.title: A Late Quartet
programme.desc: Kun maailmankuulun jousikvartetin rakastettu sellisti saa kuulla laakariltaan mullistavan diagnoosin, on koko ryhman tulevaisuus vaakalaudalla. Tukahdutetut tunteet, kilpailevat egot ja hallitsemattomat intohimot uhkaavat suistaa vuosien ystavyyden ja yhteistyon raiteiltaan. Valmistautuessaan 25. vuosipaivan juhlakonserttiinsa, joka saattaa hyvinkin jaada myos viimeiseksi, on toivo heidan maineensa sailymisesta kiinni yhteisista siteista ja musiikin voimasta. Beethovenin Jousikvartetto nro 14 cis-molli opus 131:n ymparille rakennettu A LATE QUARTET on koskettava kunnianosoitus kamarimusiikille ja New Yorkin kulttuurimaailmalle.

programme.title: Saints Of War
programme.desc: Jersey, 1942. Kanaalisaaret miehitetaan Hitlerin vahvistaessa otettaan Lansi-Euroopasta. Saksalaiset kayttavat saarta sotavankien tyoleirien tukikohtana, ja paikallisen, tiiviin yhteison tulevaisuus hailyy epavarmuuden ja pelon valilla, kuluttaen asukkaiden luonnetta ja koetellen keskinaista luottamusta.

programme.title: Time Out of Mind
programme.desc: George on epatoivoinen mies. Hanen terveytensa horjuu ja hanella ei ole mitaan minka puoleen kaantya, ja pian han loytaa itsensa New York Cityn anteeksiantamattomilta kaduilta. Kaytettyaan loppuun kaikki valiaikaisen majoituksen vaihtoehdot han hakee turvapaikkaa Bellevuen sairaalasta, Mahattanin suurimmasta kodittomien miesten vastaanottokeskuksesta. Sekin osoittautuu raaaksi ja vaikeakulkuiseksi ymparistoksi taynna samalla tavalla syrjaytyneita sieluja. Mutta Georgen ystavystyttya kokeneeseen yomaja-asukkiin Dixoniin han alkaa kypsytella mielessaan toivoa siita, etta saisi korjattua suhteen tyttareensa, josta on vieraantunut.

programme.title: Kauas pilvet karkaavat
programme.desc: Kauas pilvet karkaavat kertoo helsinkilaispariskunnasta. Raitiovaununkuljettaja ja perinteikkaan ravintola Dubrovnikin hovimestari menettavat tyonsa, mutta eivat toivoaan Aki Kaurismaen (Le Havre) Suomi-trilogian ensimmaisessa osassa.

programme.title: I Heart Huckabees
programme.desc: Albert Markovski, Open Spaces -yhdistyksen puheenjohtaja, on kokenut hammentavan sarjan sattumia, joiden tarkoitus askarruttaa hanta. Kahden eksistentiaalisen yksityisetsivan Bernard ja Vivian Jaffen avulla Albert tarkastelee elamaansa, ihmissuhteitaan ja konfliktiaan Brad Standiin, urallaan etenevan suositun tavarataloketjun Huckabeesin toimitusjohtajaan.

programme.title: My Week With Marilyn
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva brittidraama kertoo Marilyn Monroen viikosta Englannissa, jossa han oli kuvaamassa elokuvaa "Prinssi ja revyytytto" hurmaten kaikki niin kameran edessa kuin takanakin. Colin Clarkin kahteen kirjaan perustuva brittidraama kertoo Marilyn Monroen ja Laurence Olivierin tahdittaman elokuvan Prinssi ja revyytytto (1957) synnysta. Tarina keskittyy viikkoon, jolloin Clark toimi Marilyn Monroen isantana Englannissa taman miehen Arthur Millerin poistuttua maasta.

programme.title: Instrument of War
programme.desc: Kun Yhdysvaltain ilmavoimien B-24 pommikoneen pilotti Clair Cline ammutaan alas ja vangitaan Saksassa, hanen osaltaan yksi sota loppuu ja toinen - toivon yllapitaminen - alkaa. Natsien piikkilanka-aitojen saartama Cline ja muut sotavangit etsivat selviamisen lisaksi keinoja peitota vankeus. Perustuu tositapahtumiin.

programme.title: Tulitikkutehtaan tytto
programme.desc: Äitinsa ja isapuolensa kanssa asuva ja tulitikkutehtaan liukuhihnalla tyoskenteleva Iiris (Kati Outinen, Mies vailla menneisyytta ja Le Havre) erehtyy luulemaan tanssiravintolassa kohtaamansa miehen kanssa viettamaansa yota rakkaudeksi. Vaarinkasityksella on kohtalokkaat seuraukset.

programme.title: The Crying Game
programme.desc: Brittisotilas Jody joutuu IRA:n sieppaamaksi. Jodyn ja hanen vartijansa Fergusin valille muodostuu ystavyyssuhde. Kun Jodyn vapauttamiselle asetetut ehdot eivat toteudu, juuri Fergus maarataan teloittamaan Jody. Tehtava osoittautuu vaikeaksi Fergusille. Fergus pakenee ja aloittaa uuden elaman Lontoossa. Myos Jodyn aiempi elama kietoutuu Fergusin elamaan. The Crying Game on Oscar-palkittu jannityselokuva. Paaosissa Forest Whitaker, Stephen Rea ja Jaye Davidson.

programme.title: This is England
programme.desc: Elokuva sijoittuu 1980-luvun Englantiin, jossa Falklandin sotaan lahetetaan jatkuvasti lisaa sotilaita ja kansallismieliset saavat jalansijaa tyovaenluokkaisten tyottomien keskuudessa. Skan ja Oi-punkin kannattajat jakautuvat musiikin ystaviin ja skineihin. Taman kaiken keskella 12-vuotias Shaun loytaa skinijengin kanssa yhteisen savelen.

programme.title: Mark Of A Murderer
programme.desc: "Mark of a Murderer" on tositarina NYPD-etsiva Vincent Lamarasta, joka on brutaalin murhaajan kintereilla. Epaillyn tavoittaessaan etsivakonkari rukoilee kerrankin erehtyneensa: poliisin haaviin on jaanyt Joey Lamara, Vincentin oma poika!

programme.title: W.
programme.desc: Ryyppyjuhlista ja putkareissuista uudestisyntyneeksi kristityksi. Texasin oljykenttien mustasta kullasta Washingtonin Valkoiseen taloon. Isan varjosta sotaan vihollisen lin-jojen takana Irakissa. Tama on Yhdysvaltain 43. presidentin uskomaton tarina. Vihasitpa tai rakastitpa hanta - tai rakastitpa vihata hanta - George W. Bush on kiis-tatta historian kiistellyin ja puhutuin yhdysvaltalainen presidentti. Oscar®-voittaja Oliver Stone tarkastelee elokuvassaan W:ta lempeasti ja piirtaa yllattavan sympaatti-sen kuvan maalaispojasta, josta - lahinna onnettoman sattuman kautta - tuli maail-man mahtavin mies.

programme.title: The Big Short
programme.desc: Kun nelja ulkopuolista naki sen, minka isot pankit, media ja valtionhallinto kielsivat - maailmantalouden romahtamisen - he saivat ajatuksen isosta shorttauksesta. Rohkea sijoittaminen johtaa heidat pankkialan pimealle puolelle, jossa kaikki on kyseenalaistettava. Adam Mckayn (Anchorman, Step Brothers) ohjaama elokuva perustuu tositarinaan ja Michael Lewisin menestyskirjaan (The Blind Side, Moneyball). Elokuvaa tahdittavat Christian Bale, Steve Carell, Ryan Gosling ja Brad Pitt.

programme.title: Youre Not You
programme.desc: Kaksinkertainen Oscar-voittaja Hillary Swank on menestynyt konserttipianisti Kate, jossa todetaan parantumaton sairaus ALS. Hanen perheensa jarjestaa hanelle parasta mahdollista hoitoa, mutta Kate itse antautuu taysin epapatevan Becin hoiviin. Hoitoon sisaltyy yhta lailla naurua kuin kyyneleitakin, ja nama kaksi taysin erilaista naista loytavat toistensa suurimmat vahvuudet.

programme.title: Cypher
programme.desc: Yritysvakoilun hamarassa valtakunnassa kyllastynyt jokamies kompastuu petoksen verkkoon ja hanesta tulee tietamaton vakooja. Kun han navigoi petoksessa ja petoksessa, han tekee yhteistyota viettelevan arvoituksen kanssa paljastaakseen jarkyttavia totuuksia ja saadakseen takaisin identiteettinsa.

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: Rakkaus voittaa kaiken. Jopa vastustamattoman pakon syoda kumppaninsa aivokudosta! Lahitulevaisuudessa maapallolla asuu yhta paljon ihmisia syovia zombeja kuin myos zombeja vastaan taistelevia ihmisia. Hetken mielijohteesta nuori zombi R pelastaa toisten zombien hyokkaykselta Julien, jonka suonissa veri virtaa kovaa. Heidan ystavyytensa uhkaa sen hetkista maailmanjarjestysta! Julien pitaa vain pysya hengissa ja R:n pitaa pysya kuolleena tarpeeksi kauan.

programme.title: Love and Other Drugs
programme.desc: Vapaamielinen Maggie (Anne Hathaway) kohtaa Viagraa kauppaavan Jamien (Jake Gyllenhaal). Heidan kemiansa petihommissa toimii, joten he paattavat aloittaa suhteen – ilman sitoumuksia. Mutta Maggien ja Jamien ottaa valtaansa huumeista vaarallisin – rakkaus!

programme.title: Hakutulokset (Birdman)
programme.desc: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) on musta komedia paluuta tekevasta nayttelijasta (Michael Keaton), joka on jaanyt kuuluisan supersankarihahmonsa vangiksi. Kiinnityksen saaminen uskottavaksi Broadway-nayttelijaksi ei ole helppoa, ja nayttelija paatyy ryhtymaan ohjaajaksi.

programme.title: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World
programme.desc: Valtava asteroidi lahestyy Maata, ja viimeinen keino sen pysayttamiseksi on juuri epaonnistunut. Ihmiset reagoivat 21 paivan paasta koittavaan maailmanloppuun varsin kirjavilla teoilla. Vakuutusmyyja Dodgen ja naapurintytto Pennyn tiet kohtaavat mellakoiden yltyessa ja he paattavat auttaa toisiaan matkalla kohti viimeisia paamaariaan.

programme.title: Death At A Funeral
programme.desc: Danielin ja Robertin isan kuolema saattaa toraisan perheen yhteen suremaan vainajaa. Kun hautajaisiin ilmestyva mies uhkaa paljastaa vainajan jarkyttavan salaisuuden ellei saa rahaa, on veljesten keksittava jotain paastakseen kiristajasta eroon. Seremoniasta sukeutuu taysi kaaos, kun he yrittavat estaa uutisen kantautumisen saattovaen korviin.

programme.title: Silent House
programme.desc: Syrjainen mokki jarven rannalla, ei yhteytta ulkomaailmaan. Nuori nainen yrittaa sailyttaa jarkensa joutuessaan keskelle pelottavaa painajaista, josta ei paase pois. Syrjainen mokki jarven rannalla, ei yhteytta ulkomaailmaan. Nuori nainen yrittaa sailyttaa jarkensa joutuessaan keskelle pelottavaa painajaista, josta ei paase pois. Sarah valmistelee isansa ja setansa kanssa perheen vanhan kesamokin myyntia. Oudot tunkeilijat ovat vandalisoineet taloa, mutta rikkoutuneet ikkunat ja halkeilevat seinat osoittautuvatkin vahitellen heidan pienimmaksi murheekseen, kun he huomaavat, etteivat olekaan yksin? seinien raoista huokuu jotain pelottavaa?

programme.title: Twin Peaks - Tuli kulje kanssani
programme.desc: Muoviin kaaritty ruumis ajelehtii joella Deer Meadow’n pikkukaupungissa Washingtonissa. FBI kutsutaan tutkimaan tapausta, mutta kesken tutkinnan yksi agentti katoaa jalkia jattamatta. Hanen korvaajakseen saapuu erikoisagentti Dale Cooper, joka uskoo tekijan uusivan rikoksensa. Vuotta myohemmin Twin Peaksissa Laura Palmer elaa itsetuhoista elamaa lapsuutensa traumojen siivittamana, kun murhaaja iskee uudelleen. Twin Peaks – Tuli kulje kanssani on elokuva, joka solmii yhteen kultiksi julistetun televisiosarjan loysat langat kertomalla sarjaa edeltaneista tapahtumista.

programme.title: Spring Breakers
programme.desc: Brit, Candy, Cotty ja Faith ovat olleet parhaita ystavia ala-asteelta lahtien. Tytot asuvat arkisessa yliopistoasuntolassa ja janoavat seikkailua. Heidan taytyy vain saada tarpeeksi rahaa kasaan paastakseen irrottelemaan ja pitamaan hauskaa unelmalomalleen - spring breakille... Onnekas sattuma tutustuttaa heidat Alien-nimiseen rappariin, ja yhtakkia luvassa on enemman vauhtia ja jannitysta kuin he saattoivat toivoa. Kuinka pitkalle tytot ovat valmiita menemaan saadakseen unohtumattoman lomansa?

programme.title: What Maisie Knew
programme.desc: Isan lyottaytyessa sopimattomasti yhteen Maisien lastenhoitajan kanssa ja aidin loytaessa vierelleen nuoren baarimikon Lincolnin, kasvavat eroriidan panokset entisestaan, ja viattoman Maisie-paran sukkulointi kotien valilla saa yha sydamettomampia piirteita. Maisie pitaa kuitenkin silmansa valppaasti apposen auki ja nakee tarkasti sokean itsekkyyden lavitse. Maisie tietaa, etta hanen on itse raivattava tiensa kotiin aikuisten lapsellisuuden suosta.

programme.title: Cypher
programme.desc: Yritysvakoilun hamarassa valtakunnassa kyllastynyt jokamies kompastuu petoksen verkkoon ja hanesta tulee tietamaton vakooja. Kun han navigoi petoksessa ja petoksessa, han tekee yhteistyota viettelevan arvoituksen kanssa paljastaakseen jarkyttavia totuuksia ja saadakseen takaisin identiteettinsa.

programme.sub-title: S09 : E23 Bill, Mike and Ginger/Wanda
programme.desc: A gunman enters a Florida school board meeting and begins shooting hostages.

programme.title: I Survived . . .
programme.desc: A woman is left for dead when two terrorists storm the hotel she is staying in.

programme.title: I Survived . . .
programme.desc: A 17-year-old girl fights to stay alive after having her throat cut.

programme.title: I Survived . . .
programme.desc: Maria feared for her safety.

programme.title: I Survived . . .
programme.desc: A college freshman is sexually assaulted at gunpoint.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Frustrated with her lack of flying and stuck in a rut as a courier driver, Audrey decides her time at Buffalo is over.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a ferry breakdown causes a gasoline shortage in Yellowknife, new manager Duane begs Chuck to return and prepare the Electra for a fuel haul.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duane lands a huge contract for the Electra and puts enormous pressure on mechanic Adam to prep the plane without the help of his mentor Chuck.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Sparks fly when Joe discovers Gord has taken a job with a rival airline after completing expensive training on one of the Buffalo planes.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Trying to make his mark at Buffalo, Duane lands two more Electra contracts.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duanes decision to leave the Electra crew unsupervised while he spends time at home jeopardizes the completion of a major contract, and could cost him his job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie waterbomber pilot Scott gets his first taste of action when Buffalo responds to an emergency callout to fight fires in Alberta.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When Yellowknife and the northern aviation community are rocked by three crashes in the space of a month, Joe places an extra emphasis on safety.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe receives a negative visit from Transport Canada when inspectors threaten to shut down the airline.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Weighed down by the responsibility of training a new rampie, and struggling to get out of Joes doghouse, DC-3 co-pilot Tyler gets a once in a lifetime opportunity to stunt fly in his Cessna 150 for a visiting film crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After taking command of an intense airlift, and dealing with the ugliest Electra load hes ever seen, Scott takes a scary fall on the icy tarmac.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Just months from retiring, Electra captain Ray Weber leads his crew on a multi-trip mission that requires landing on a rough ice strip on a remote lake.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When South Korean buyers come to Buffalo to look at a water bomber, the pressure is on mechanic Cory to get the plane ready.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Justin and Cory attempt to place a Canadair CL-215 aircraft onto a cargo ship for delivery to a Korean company.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: In South Korea, Cory and Justin meet the ship delivering Buffalos water bomber plane to new buyers there.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Greenlands Narsarsuaq airport - known as one the worlds most dangerous approaches - looms on the horizon as Cory and Justin begin a trans-global journey to deliver two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey hire a helicopter for a salvage mission to retrieve the rare tailpiece from a Lockheed 10-A that crashed in the Yellowknife woods forty years ago.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Justin and Cory are stranded in Croatia while trying to complete the delivery of two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey links up with Chris Hadfield aboard the International Space Station. Problems mount while trying to get a frozen DC-4 airborne.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot David faces a remote Arctic airstrip with sketchy landing gear. Mikey drafts a Buffalo hockey team to face off against an NHL squad in a charity shootout. Chuck gets a chance to shine on the ice.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A cold snap triggers massive challenges. Devan runs into gear problems while he ferries a mothballed DC-3 across the country. And Justin has to make a snap decision with his newborn son aboard his plane.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Electra returns from repairs and the crew takes it right back to the ice strip that it set off from before the crash landing last year. Tyler works up the courage to confront Joe about a big decision. A hotshot Australian pilot tries to earn a job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Facing Joes wrath, Rod and Cory head to the UK to make urgent water bomber repairs. David tries to prove himself to Devan in the C-46 but ends up infuriating Devan. Will makes an ultimatum in Hay River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey trains for High Arctic survival with the Canadian Rangers. The Air Force invades Chucks hangar. Joe faces tough competition at a California plane auction.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Cory, Chuck and Brian watch as a 5,000-pound power unit smash to the ground, denting the Electra and putting it out of commission. Mikey scrambles to manage the crisis while Joe races to England to try and purchase a backup Electra.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Co-pilot Graemes fumbles his Electra training landings. Chris stresses over his C-46 check ride. Adam rescues a stranded C-46.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey head to England to bring home a new plane. Devan does target-practice in the DC-4.James builds a Buffalo-style soapbox racer.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe flies with the Snowbirds during the Hamilton air show and later teaches Mikey to fly. A surprise departure shakes up Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: An engine fire and series of mechanical gremlins has Buffalo scrambling to make its Christmas deliveries. Newest rampie Prefkar Mony struggles with life in the North.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalos Electra aircraft is hammered by rough winds up the Mackenzie Valley. In Hay River, a rookie crew faces the worst ice storm in years and one rampie has a tough go trying to fit in at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine trouble plagues Buffalos newest Electra, ZFE, and a standoff between Joe and Transport Canada threatens to close the airline. At the same time, Joe faces a tough decision about his old dog Sophie.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe leaves to undergo medical tests at the Mayo Clinic in Phoenix, Arizona. Jeff and Sam stress over their DC-3 checkflights and Joe celebrates turning 70-his way.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey decides to get Buffalo involved in a D-Day paratrooper jump to commemorate the 70th anniversary of D-Day.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalos top guns, rookies and vets, go to California for aerial dogfights in real fighter planes. Cory and Mikey race to get ready for the D-Day jump.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikeys much-planned D-Day tribute parachute jump with 20 paratroopers hits a wall when Joe refuses to fly his DC-3 to the drop zone.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot Scott faces his worst nightmare when a faltering Curtiss C-46 Commando engine and low fog force a scary landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A string of bad luck turns chief pilot Arnies 66th birthday run into the flight from hell - and threatens to spoil his naughty birthday surprise.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mechanic Cory races against the clock to turn two short-haul waterbombers into transatlantic aircraft for the epic journey to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mechanic Cory races against the clock to turn two short-haul waterbombers into transatlantic aircraft for the epic journey to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A charter flight falls through the cracks after the McBryans attend a wild family wedding, and an irate Joe pulls captain Justin from the Turkey test flights to do the job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: AJ and Candace get married in the Ice Castle. A frustrated Chuck tries to get the Electra to pay her way. A flummoxed Mikey tries to bake a cake for Joes birthday.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Turkey crew makes the critical jump over the North Atlantic. But en route to Portugal, one crew is forced to turn back.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: C-46 and DC-4 crews race against the spring melt to fly mining equipment to an airstrip on a frozen lake.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After thousands of hours of painstaking preparation and dangerous flying, a terrible accident devastates the waterbomber crew in Turkey - and everyone at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey head off to Coventry, England to navigate the potential purchase of an Electra turboprop to add to Buffalos fleet of fire-fighting tanker planes.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After her husbands acrimonious departure from Buffalo, Kelly has a confrontation that decides whether she, too, will quit.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: As Joe fights a Transport Canada claim against the airline, star pilot Justin is tasked with shipping an 8,000lb generator to a remote town.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a deadly fire destroys a northern outpost a week before Christmas, Buffalo puts everything aside to come to the rescue.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey goes on a treasure hunt to Venezuela for a rare CL-215 waterbomber.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A vital ferry link is down, so Buffalo mounts an all-out campaign to airlift 100,000lbs of essential goods across the Mackenzie River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Crusty mechanic Chuck leads the scramble to ready the Electra for a disaster relief mission in Haiti, but fates curveball sends them to the High Arctic instead.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A multi-stop mission to the Far North has Devan, Scott and Adam facing a series of white- knuckle obstacles.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalo scores the charter of a lifetime when theyre asked to transport the Stanley Cup on a tour of the North.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Chief pilot Arnie lands the DC-3 on a homemade sand strip at a remote lodge; Electra expert Chuck faces off with a stubborn power unit; Rods wife Sasha goes into labor.
