programme.title: Being There at the End
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S2 - "Being There at the End"
programme.desc: In this episode, we discover that spirit and tactics for real endurance teams become vital in order to claim victory at the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa.

programme.title: Namibia
programme.desc: Bill has a dual quest—the first to visit one of the greatest deserts in the world and find out how the creatures and plants survive. The other is a bit unorthodox and maybe unbelievable – he’s going to seek, and hopefully find, the mythical unicorn.

programme.title: Canada, Part II
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 The Travel Bug S2 - "Canada, Part II"
programme.desc: We explore the French settled east of the country. We visit the awe-inspiring Niagara Falls, before heading into the wilderness. But it’s the discovery of Canada’s history as we take in the sites of Toronto, Ottawa and Montreal.

programme.title: Fiji
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 The Travel Bug S2 - "Fiji"
programme.desc: Fiji is the perfect destination for those looking for a hassle-free holiday. It has white, sandy beaches, five star resorts, golf courses, snorkelling and other watersports. We uncover the story of its people and cultural diversity.

programme.title: On Thin Ice
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "On Thin Ice"
programme.desc: On a rare day off, Josiah and his friends white water raft where few have gone before - on top of the massive Knik Glacier.

programme.title: Horses Can Think... Rafts Cant
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Horses Can Think... Rafts Cant"
programme.desc: Episode two begins where one left off, with Casey facing a decision. Positioned precariously on the mountain, they realize the ram theyre chasing isnt legal, forcing them to retreat.

programme.title: Band of Ten
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Band of Ten"
programme.desc: In episode three, the crew encounters a canyon with ten rams, sparking initial excitement. However, the subsequent desappointment sets in as none of the rams meet the legal criteria.

programme.title: The Test
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 The Flying Kestrel S2 - "The Test"
programme.desc: The new version of the Flying Kestrel is ready to be put to the test at one of the most state of the art wind tunnels. Has the team done enough to create a record-breaking car?

programme.title: Choke Point
programme.desc: The terrain begins to change as the Keefer brothers are forced to pick their way downstream. The landscape tightens it’s grip and funnels the brothers to a geographic choke point where both predator and prey gather.

programme.title: Bone-Weary
programme.desc: The Keefer brothers take shelter in a small pine outcropping as a winter storm sets siege to the river. Forced to wait out the arctic blast, the brothers try and retain what little energy they have left.

programme.title: Fireside Fortune
programme.desc: Using up the last of their energy, the Keefer brothers make their way down stream in search of their next supply cache. The tide turns as they finally make their way out of the open tundra and into the heart of moose country.

programme.title: Surviving Nature’s Fury – Storms
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Survival Science S1 - "Surviving Nature’s Fury – Storms"
programme.desc: Nick and Laura experience Nature’s fury through storm amazing generating gear that simulates terrible hurricanes, ice cold winds and even tornados. For these experiments they’ll use remarkable technology that creates massive storms on Hollywood sets.

programme.title: Surviving a Mountain Lion Attack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Survival Science S1 - "Surviving a Mountain Lion Attack"
programme.desc: Laura and Nick explore the techniques to deal with these apex predators when they are the most dangerous. We’ll scientifically breakdown the behaviors, strength, eyesight and speed of mountain lions through outrageous experiments, in day and night.

programme.title: LOST!
programme.desc: Nick and Laura head deep into the mountains to explore survival techniques that go far beyond anything they’ve learned before. Our courageous hosts subject themselves to intense survival training with the Survival Training School of California.

programme.title: Man Eating Crocs
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Man Eats Wild S2 - "Man Eating Crocs"
programme.desc: Mario risks it all by rafting down the deadliest strip of water in Africa, the Zambezi River, towards lake Kariba, only to find himself in front of some of the biggest and baddest problematic man-eating crocodiles on the planet.

programme.title: Namibian Desert Onyx
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Man Eats Wild S2 - "Namibian Desert Onyx"
programme.desc: Mario was told by locals that deep in the Namibian desert there is an odd-looking creature that is great nutritional value that has been harvested by people for hundreds of years.

programme.title: Kalahari Bushmen
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Man Eats Wild S2 - "Kalahari Bushmen"
programme.desc: In the Kalahari Desert is an ancient tribe that has lived off the land since the beginning of man kind. These people are known as the Naru bushman.

programme.title: The Broads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Hunting Fish S1 - "The Broads"
programme.desc: Thom hunt is challenged to hunt the mighty Pike in the Uk’s Norfolk Broads.

programme.title: Extremadura
programme.desc: Thom hunt is challenged to hunt a record-breaking Barbel in the Spain’s striking Extremadura.

programme.title: UK
programme.desc: Thom hunt challenges himself to locate and catch four UK species in one week.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Jake and Marilynn cancel a dinner party so they can respond to an injured skier on Teton Pass.

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: The team battles high winds in the heli to save a snowmobiler with a busted femur.

programme.title: Episode 5
programme.desc: Unprecedented three rescues in under twelve hours.

programme.title: Fighting Fish
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "Fighting Fish"
programme.desc: Angling experts Lori-Ann Murphy and Aaron Adams prove that catching a tarpon is no easy feat as they try to land a silver king in the Florida Keys. Dr. Jerry Ault discusses the research underway as scientists try to unravel the mysteries of these fish.

programme.title: Tippets and Leaders
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "Tippets and Leaders"
programme.desc: The teams goal of landing and tagging a mature tarpon is fulfilled, as one of the anglers lands a 60lbs silver king. Michael Keaton and Yvon Choulnard spend time wading throught the flats together and we look back on the week spend in Belize.

programme.title: Return Home
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 The Trail S1 - "Return Home"
programme.desc: Laramy and 7 say goodbye to their final camp and head home.

programme.title: Day Two Pt. 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day Two Pt. 1"
programme.desc: Day two of the Madfin Shark Series begins, as its becoming clearer which of our four 2-man teams will have to do whatever it takes to not be in last place and being eliminated. Hurricane Hole Marina in Key West sees the sharks finding captains idle.

programme.title: Day Two Pt.2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day Two Pt.2"
programme.desc: Day two and the battle continues on the Madfin Shark Series. Four of our 2-man teams are catching and releasing the biggest and most dangerous sharks they can for the most points they can accrue. After today, one team will be sent home and eliminated.

programme.title: Day Three Pt. 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day Three Pt. 1"
programme.desc: Its the third and final day of competition for the remaining 3 teams in this intense shark tournament. See how the first half of the day turns out.

programme.title: Just Another Fijian
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Just Another Fijian"
programme.desc: Dwane and Jools are joined by their pint sized proteges this week, as 12-year-olds Eli and Reef tag along on the adventure with the old men on a mission to explore the far flung waters of North Eastern Fiji.

programme.title: Germany / Morocco
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Epic Exploring S1 - "Germany / Morocco"
programme.desc: This time urban explorers Josh and Cody separately visit Germany and Morocco in search of astonishing abandoned locations including Wunsdorf, the forbidden city near Berlin, and an abandoned filmset in the Sahara desert used for Game of Thrones.

programme.title: Georgia / France
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Epic Exploring S1 - "Georgia / France"
programme.desc: Josh and Cody are separately visiting Georgia and France. Cody, together with rooftopper Harry Gallagher, undertakes a cable car trip known as Stalin’s coffin. Josh is in France searching for abandoned chateaus with globetrotter Lexie Limitless.

programme.title: Germany / England
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Epic Exploring S1 - "Germany / England"
programme.desc: Josh and Cody are diving into the underworld. This time, Josh explores the abandoned German mining industry, including an encounter with a Police squad, and in England, Cody explores an old Soviet submarine in the English Medway river.

programme.title: Fun in The Sun
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 Wardens S5 - "Fun in The Sun"
programme.desc: When Jet skies get too close to boats things can turn dangerous. And Warden Bryan Golie questions an angler in search for the truth.

programme.title: Above and Beyond
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 Wardens S5 - "Above and Beyond"
programme.desc: Wardens often go the extra mile to investigate a report of illegal activity, help a hunter or protect landowner rights. This week Wardens go that extra mile with an unexpected outcome.

programme.title: Thrill Kill
programme.desc: In 2012 The small community of Whitefish Montana was shocked by the useless killing of over 20 deer. Region 1 Wardens think outside the box to put a stop to this heinous crime.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: A Canadian MTB adventurer explores Madagascar and shows the behind the scenes processes of making a film.

programme.title: Norway
programme.desc: An Irish MTB pro rider discovers and rides the most amazing trails that Norway has to offer from the mountains to the ocean.

programme.title: Alaska
programme.desc: We follow one of the best MTB riders and trail-builders on the planet during a trip in Alaska, one of the most remote and wild places in the world.

programme.title: The Harder Terry Falls
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S6 - "The Harder Terry Falls"
programme.desc: Dust off your chaps as Terry tests several things from the epic western The Harder They Fall, and a canteen buster test from Gunsmoke!

programme.title: Croatia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Running the World S1 - "Croatia"
programme.desc: Max and Benj Cave travel to Croatia to meet up with local parkour experts and undertake an epic run in an abandoned aluminium factory.

programme.title: Santorini
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Running the World S1 - "Santorini"
programme.desc: A challenge to race each other and a labyrinth of narrow streets and hidden passages to navigate will make this one of the trickiest challenges.

programme.title: Los Angeles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "Los Angeles"
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie goes to Hollywood arriving in a million dollar V12 Ferrari. In the ‘City of Angels’ Alex is brought into contact with the Brotherhood of Racing, a community of drivers looking to create safe racing conditions for amateurs.

programme.title: Houston
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "Houston"
programme.desc: Given special access to a 2 million dollar exclusive McClaren Senna, Supercar Blondie digs under the surface to uncover gang feuds in the SLAB (Slow, Low and Bangin’) community and meets up with legendary hip hop artists Slim Thug and Paul Wall.

programme.title: Peak District and Derbyshire
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Epic Trails S2 - "Peak District and Derbyshire"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson heads to the Peak District in England, to tackle the 268-mile Pennine Way—Britain’s oldest and most challenging National Trail.

programme.title: Juneau, Alaska
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Epic Trails S2 - "Juneau, Alaska"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson heads deep into the backcountry to explore the mountains, glaciers and wildlife around Alaska’s capital city of Juneau.

programme.title: The Gift of Community
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Kindness Diaries S2 - "The Gift of Community"
programme.desc: Leon crashes and is stranded on the icy Yukon roads. He is invited to a party where one man opens his home to countless refugees.

programme.title: The Gift of Purpose
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Kindness Diaries S2 - "The Gift of Purpose"
programme.desc: After breaking down in Montana, Leon stays in a snowy wonderland. In Salt Lake City one woman’s passion to help others inspires his next gift.

programme.title: Special
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 The Travel Bug S2 - "Special"
programme.desc: We’ve saved the best for last in the final episode of season one of The Travel Bug. Here we take a look at the highlights of the season. We show some amazing places including Lord Howe Island and hidden gems of the Pacific.

programme.title: The Reveal
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 The Flying Kestrel S2 - "The Reveal"
programme.desc: At Santa Pod raceway, engineer and driver Jon Webster reveals the final Flying Kestrel to Joel and Nigel McNully, he gives them a tour around the finished car and shows them all the changes he has made, all to hopefully get a land speed record.

programme.title: New Zealand and Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Travel Quest S1 - "New Zealand and Australia"
programme.desc: Bill has always been fascinated with the Americas Cup yacht racing – it’s as intense as the name implies. But the big adventure is riding in, and then flying, a Soviet Mig Jet doing stunts and mind numbing close fly-bys.

programme.title: Kenyas Great Grasslands
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Travel Quest S1 - "Kenyas Great Grasslands"
programme.desc: Bicycling is a safe and leisurely activity, until you decide to do it through the wilderness of Kenya with large lion, elephant and buffalo populations.

programme.title: Wild Indonesia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Travel Quest S1 - "Wild Indonesia"
programme.desc: Bill had two wild icons he wanted to experience. The first is the largest lizard in the world - the Komodo Dragon. Walking among these massive beasts was unnerving to say the least. The other is Asias one ape - the orangutan.

programme.title: Siberia and Mongolia
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Travel Quest S2 - "Siberia and Mongolia"
programme.desc: This episode literally takes you to some of the world’s remotest places. First, a visit to Siberia…one of the most foreboding places on earth and yet we learn many of the stories are just myths.

programme.title: Ryozenji Temple Shikoku, Japan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Ryozenji Temple Shikoku, Japan"
programme.desc: In this episode the brothers shun the more famous areas, Tokyo and Kyoto, and head to the isolated, ancient island of Shikoku. Their route is the ancient 88 Temple Zen pilgrimage circuit.

programme.title: Kettle Barbecues
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Cooks on Fire S2 - "Kettle Barbecues"
programme.desc: The five returning teams go back to basics cooking poultry on classic kettle barbecues. Just when they think they have it all under control the judges throw them a surprise twist.

programme.title: Palau and Guam
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Travel Quest S2 - "Palau and Guam"
programme.desc: Exploring the islands of Palau and Guam includes a submarine view of the ocean wildlife, exploration of the battles of World War II, learning the culture of the locals and snorkeling among thousands of jellyfish.

programme.title: Panama
programme.desc: There is probably no country in the world that has more to do with world commerce than Panama. But Panama is more than just the canal—it’s a haven for wildlife.

programme.title: Recovery
programme.desc: After a skiing accident, Mike has a swollen face. He heads for Silfra fissure in Thingavellir National Park, to ice his body in the freezing waters.

programme.title: Battling the Elements
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Extreme Iceland S1 - "Battling the Elements"
programme.desc: Mike Wilson heads to the south west highlands, where he gets a tip off that Tindfjallajokull contains all the right elements needed for base jumping.

programme.title: Rivers and Volcanoes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Extreme Iceland S1 - "Rivers and Volcanoes"
programme.desc: Having taken on the roads, snowy slopes and mountains of Iceland, Mike Wilson shifts his attention to other aspects of the landscape: the rivers and volcanoes.

programme.title: Now or Never
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Now or Never"
programme.desc: As the fog passes on the peak of Fish Hooks rocky face, the outline of the crew appears exactly where the ram was bedded last. Did they shoot and Chris not hear the shot?

programme.title: Saddles Sores
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Saddles Sores"
programme.desc: Leaving sheep country on a high, the men face a daunting 22-hour trail ride to Tom-Tom, the first moose camp. Two days of riding loom a head before reaching their destination. However, trouble strikes just eight hours into the journey.

programme.title: Church on the Mountain
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Church on the Mountain"
programme.desc: In the Yukon, decisions are pivotal and amplified in its rugged terrain. The brothers close in on a giant grizzly, now within 500 yards, with the decision lying in Chriss hands.

programme.title: Now or Never
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Dropped S1 - "Now or Never"
programme.desc: With lifted spirits, the Keefer brothers set out to spot and stalk a herd of caribou near by, but closing in proves more difficult than expected.

programme.title: Cache Out
programme.desc: With red meat, the Keefer brothers are finally able to replenish their depleted energy, but they arent the only ones looking to survive the winter in the Alaskan wilderness.

programme.title: Bearing Down
programme.desc: The harsh reality of winter sets in, and the Keefer brothers are forced to sleep with one eye open as a grizzly patrols the area around their camp.

programme.title: Through the Night
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S3 - "Through the Night"
programme.desc: The 24 Hours of Spa is a notoriously difficult race. For Andy Soucek, Albert Costa and Lewis Williamson, making it through night presents a tough challenge.

programme.title: Episode 6
programme.desc: Jamie puts his trust in new explosives technology.

programme.title: Kettle Barbecues
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Cooks on Fire S2 - "Kettle Barbecues"
programme.desc: The five returning teams go back to basics cooking poultry on classic kettle barbecues. Just when they think they have it all under control the judges throw them a surprise twist.

programme.title: Palau and Guam
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Travel Quest S2 - "Palau and Guam"
programme.desc: Exploring the islands of Palau and Guam includes a submarine view of the ocean wildlife, exploration of the battles of World War II, learning the culture of the locals and snorkeling among thousands of jellyfish.

programme.title: Panama
programme.desc: There is probably no country in the world that has more to do with world commerce than Panama. But Panama is more than just the canal—it’s a haven for wildlife.

programme.title: Abandoned Village
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Roads End S1 - "Abandoned Village"
programme.desc: Rob and Dave embrace their adventurous sides when they abandon the plan to take the safe route and instead take on what could be their most challenging riding.

programme.title: Fiambala
programme.desc: In this episode, Rob and Dave drive through Fiambala and decide to stop at the town’s most famous site the naturally occurring hot springs baths.

programme.title: Crater
programme.desc: Rob and Dave continue their journey to Salta, but before they go anywhere near the glorious wine capital they make a detour the Cerro Blanco, a large volcano.

programme.title: Ken Henderson Story
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Fight to Survive S1 - "Ken Henderson Story"
programme.desc: Best friends, Ed Cohen and Ken Henderson, set out for two days of Texas gulf fishing. Tragedy strikes and the two men are stranded adrift in hostile waters.

programme.title: C.J. Wickersham Story
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Fight to Survive S1 - "C.J. Wickersham Story"
programme.desc: This week, well hear the harrowing tale of C.J. Wickersham who will fight to survive a shark attack while spear fishing.

programme.title: Jamey Mosch
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Fight to Survive S1 - "Jamey Mosch"
programme.desc: This week on Trip Gone Bad, were following hunter Jamey Mosch into the Florida everglades as his hunting trips turns into a 4 day nightmare.

programme.title: Into The High Lonesome
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Trail S1 - "Into The High Lonesome"
programme.desc: Modern day Mountain Man Laramy Miller sets out on the trail to experience life in the high lonesome.

programme.title: Camp Otis
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Trail S1 - "Camp Otis"
programme.desc: Life at Camp Otis. Laramy finds success fishing and foraging, and spends his time taking care of 7 and doing camp chores.

programme.title: Relocation
programme.desc: Laramy realizes that game is scarce because of the wolves and he decides to put some distance between himself and the pack. Time to break down camp and move to a new location.

programme.title: Day 5
programme.desc: In the Chinese desert, Kevin finds out that desert racing is difficult. While in Bolivia, Jalou wants to prove to her brother that women can be better drivers.

programme.title: Day 6
programme.desc: After exploring Peru, Jalou has to get over her fear when she goes white water kayaking. In Thailand, Kevin is feeling the pressure.

programme.title: The Track T
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Geared Up S1 - "The Track T"
programme.desc: A 1972 Ford Track T Roadster is incomplete and needs Titan Restorarion;s finishing touch with its flathead V8 engine.

programme.title: Romania
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Road Less Traveled S3 - "Romania"
programme.desc: A meeting with a woman who secretly transcribed 3,000 Hollywood films while under an oppressive regime inspires Jonathan to make his own movie. So with a small budget and a cast of local actors he scouts Saxon castles, Danube tributaries, and ruined buildings to direct an action adventure flick.

programme.title: Central India: Land of Pilgrimages
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Journeys in India S2 - "Central India: Land of Pilgrimages"
programme.desc: Two of the most sacred places in India are featured in this fascinating episode. Bill first burst the myths surrounding the legendary Khajuraho and its intricately carved temples before heading to the Holy City of Varanasi.

programme.title: Mysore: The Rebel Kingdom
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Journeys in India S2 - "Mysore: The Rebel Kingdom"
programme.desc: Journeys explores the history and fables that surround the controversial rebel leader Tipu Sultan. Mysore was the center of an Empire strong enough to challenge the British.

programme.title: Century Homes
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent S3 - "Century Homes"
programme.desc: Louise, Jason and their two kids have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. They want a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Waterfront
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent S3 - "Waterfront"
programme.desc: Diego is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with is music.

programme.title: Skullbase
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Skullbase"
programme.desc: The Walsh twins reveal why water safety crews and rescue teams are the unsung heroes of big wave surfing.

programme.title: Impact Zone
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Impact Zone"
programme.desc: Francisco Porcella displays the unquenchable spirit that drives the desire to chase big waves.

programme.title: Santa Fe Railroads and Glamping
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Travels with Darley S1 - "Santa Fe Railroads and Glamping"
programme.desc: Darley explores history and nature in and around Santa Fe, New Mexico. She rides the new Sky Railway and talks to its creator, George R.R. Martin of Game of Thrones. Join her to discover diverse glamping and New Mexican cuisine and wellness.

programme.title: Santa Fe Art and History
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Travels with Darley S1 - "Santa Fe Art and History"
programme.desc: Darley shares history, food, and art in New Mexico. Learn about Georgia O’Keeffe’s life at Ghost Ranch from a cowboy who grew up with her. Explore art along Canyon Road and at Origami in the Garden along the Turquoise Trail National Scenic Byway.

programme.title: Boston and Amilla
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Travel in Style S4 - "Boston and Amilla"
programme.desc: The final episode of the series sees us jetting off to America again, where we’ll be visiting the city Boston. We also make a trip back to the Maldives, but this time we want to relax a little!

programme.title: Detroit
programme.desc: Punk rocker Jon-Mikal formed his band The Idiot Kids as a way to deal with his sexuality. After coming out to his family at 21, he uses writing and his stage performance as a form of therapy.

programme.title: Toscana
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Finding Little Italy S1 - "Toscana"
programme.desc: In this episode we will drive through the UNESCO-protected Val d’Orcia to find a different Tuscany. In lieu of Chianti we will visit the eco-friendly Salcheto winery in the area’s great Montepulciano region.

programme.title: Umbria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Finding Little Italy S1 - "Umbria"
programme.desc: In this episode we shall have a brief stop at the tallest man-made waterfall in Europe before exploring some of the area’s towns. Orvieto, with its medieval centre and underground Etruscan ruins sets the stage.

programme.title: The Fedora
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Social Fabric S1 - "The Fedora"
programme.desc: Kyle Ng explores the Pachuco culture, meets a celebrity hatmaker and travels to the UK to run with the Rude Boys, all to find out more about the infamous headwear known as the fedora.

programme.title: Plaid
programme.desc: Kyle Ng visits Scotland to see how tartan is part of a familys DNA, hangs with a low rider club in California and sees how plaid fabric is a part of tribal identity in Africa.

programme.title: Cowboy Boots
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Social Fabric S1 - "Cowboy Boots"
programme.desc: Kyle Ng travels the world to learn how the cowboy boot made its way off the prairie. He visits Texas, where it all began, chills with cowboys in Rome and rocks out with Kenyan heavy metal cowboys.

programme.title: Hong Kong
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Wonders Of... S2 - "Hong Kong"
programme.desc: On Wonders of Hong Kong, Ashley will show you that there’s something to keep you busy in this amazing city. With Chinese influence in every direction, Ashley takes you on a walk through the history that can still be seen today.

programme.title: Singapore
programme.desc: There’s no place like Singapore – a country that has high standards in everything. This orderly country still manages to have an amazing charm that Ashley explores in Little India and Chinatown.

programme.title: China
programme.desc: The canals of Suzhou make you feel you are part of a fairytale, but the classical gardens make you feel like an elite scholar! Ashley explores China for the first time and becomes part of the traditional Chinese opera.

programme.title: Paris
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 World of Travel S1 - "Paris"
programme.desc: TV Host Lindsey Granger and Director Kolyn Boyd leave no stone unturned in Paris. From Paris Fashion Week, to being up close and personal with Mona Lisa, to sleeping at Bonapartes home, experience Paris in a way you’ve never seen it before.

programme.title: UAE (Dubai and Abu Dhabi)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 World of Travel S1 - "UAE (Dubai and Abu Dhabi)"
programme.desc: Lindsey Granger and Kolyn Boyd explore the UAE. From skydiving over Dubais Palm Jumeirah to swimming with sharks, to marveling at the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, this episode blends adventure, luxury and culture into an unforgettable journey.

programme.title: South of France
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 World of Travel S1 - "South of France"
programme.desc: Lindsey Granger and Kolyn Boyd explore the South of France, better known as Côte dAzur. From lavender fields to spending time at Coco Chanel’s favorite hang-out, to trying the oldest wine in the region, this episode is one for the books.

programme.title: Retirement
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent S3 - "Retirement"
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow.

programme.title: Sweet Country Home
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent S3 - "Sweet Country Home"
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto.

programme.title: A Smart Decision
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent S3 - "A Smart Decision"
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlenes one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school.

programme.title: Brittany V Cayman Islands
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Jet Set S1 - "Brittany V Cayman Islands"
programme.desc: So who will be crowned with the overall Jet Set victory in series 1? In this final episode Gill embarks on a gastronomic tour of North West France. While Richard has an altogether different aqua experience, swimming with dolphins and stingrays.

programme.title: Travel in Style
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Travel in Style S5 - "Travel in Style"
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they’ll like?

programme.title: Treetops
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent S4 - "Treetops"
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He’s a marketing director and she’s a doctor so she’s often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls?

programme.title: Cape Verde
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 A New Life in the Sun S1 - "Cape Verde"
programme.desc: An expat fisherman scores a big catch in Cape Verde, while another struggles in Spain. A French BandB receives its first review, and a boutique hotel launches a wedding business.

programme.title: Dream Homes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 House Hunt S1 - "Dream Homes"
programme.desc: Lovebirds Jess and Simon need help from their parents to buy a home on Auckland’s North Shore and Queenstown couple Will and Grace prepare to go to auction on their dream home.

programme.title: Newlyweds
programme.desc: Newly wed immigrants Sam and Maria get some inside info from a real estate agent as they search for a home for their future family.. and in Auckland, North Shore duo Jess and Simon prepare to go to auction on their dream home, but will their budget of $615,000 be enough?

programme.title: 328 Katong Laksa
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Must Eat! Must See! Must Do! - Singapore S2 - "328 Katong Laksa"
programme.desc: Once you touchdown in Singapore, taste the famed laksa dish at 328 Katong Laksa, before shuttling over to the underground Battle Box and re-live Singapore’s surrender during War World II. And then head to the largest indoor skydiving for some fun.

programme.title: Fort Canning Park
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Must Eat! Must See! Must Do! - Singapore S2 - "Fort Canning Park"
programme.desc: After sampling Singapore’s national breakfast of eggs and kaya toast, stroll through Fort Canning Park where Malay royalty used to live and then polish off a bowl of the Hakka soup dish – yong tau fu.

programme.title: The Changi Murals
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Must Eat! Must See! Must Do! - Singapore S2 - "The Changi Murals"
programme.desc: Take in the Changi Murals, a series of paintings that inspired hope in the Allied prisoners of war, before checking in to the 23,000 square feet indoor spa. As your stomach growls in hunger, wolf down a plate of Hainanese Chicken Rice.

programme.title: Leather Jacket
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Social Fabric S1 - "Leather Jacket"
programme.desc: Made for bomber pilots, the leather jacket is a beloved style icon all over the world. Kyle Ng gets punk in Tokyo, races around New York and meets the father of the over-the-top championship jacket.

programme.title: House for an Athlete
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent S4 - "House for an Athlete"
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they’ll like?

programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent S4 - "Treetops"
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He’s a marketing director and she’s a doctor so she’s often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls?

programme.desc: An expat fisherman scores a big catch in Cape Verde, while another struggles in Spain. A French BandB receives its first review, and a boutique hotel launches a wedding business.

programme.title: Dream Homes

programme.desc: Lovebirds Jess and Simon need help from their parents to buy a home on Auckland’s North Shore and Queenstown couple Will and Grace prepare to go to auction on their dream home.

programme.title: Newlyweds
programme.desc: Newly wed immigrants Sam and Maria get some inside info from a real estate agent as they search for a home for their future family.. and in Auckland, North Shore duo Jess and Simon prepare to go to auction on their dream home, but will their budget of $615,000 be enough?

programme.title: Las Vegas, USA
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Breaking Beyond S1 - "Las Vegas, USA"
programme.desc: Brazilian Bboy Neguin is visiting his friend Bboy Ronnie in his hometown Las Vegas. Ronnie istaking Neguin to meet all the different artists and dancers who are able to make a living inVegas by doing what they love most: performing on stage.

programme.title: Tokyo, Japan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Breaking Beyond S1 - "Tokyo, Japan"
programme.desc: Vegas Bboy Ronnie is traveling to Japan to visit Bboy Shigekix in his hometown Tokyo. Shigekix will take Ronnie on an exciting Journey to show the Japanese culture and its unique style of breaking and hip-hop.

programme.title: India: Can Kolkata be considered a foodie destination of India?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Maximum Foodie S1 - "India: Can Kolkata be considered a foodie destination of India?"
programme.desc: Liesel pinballs around a city known for its gastronomy, the forgotten hub of British East India trading company, Kolkata. From trying out what the bustling city’s vibrant street food scene has to offer, to the lesser known gems, including, venturing into India’s only Chinatown and sampling their delicacies. A tale of walking food tours, hole in the wall joints serving up North Eastern dumplings, messy fish markets, and of course, the pride of Bengal, the Hilsa fish. Is Kolkata up to par with the other major metropolitan cities of India? This episode finds out exactly that!

programme.title: Nevada: What else is there in Nevada for foodies besides Vegas?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Nevada: What else is there in Nevada for foodies besides Vegas?"
programme.desc: This investigative mission starts off in the sin city atmosphere of the Vegas strip. After a gluttonous stint at a generic buffet, Liesel is inspired to do a road trip to find iconic gems in the state of Nevada. From ghost towns, to monstrous foodie challenges, to hole in the wall dive bars in the middle of nowhere, this trip has it all. Liesel finds the resurgence of Basque cuisine in Northern Nevada, and learns that Reno can do fine dining as well! A trip to Virginia city also reveals that the Silver State has some haunted bars where patrons from the 1800s are rumored to be still imbibing and spooking locals! It’s a road trip in every sense of the word!

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Aerial Mountains: South Korea S1 - "Episode 2"
programme.desc: Gracefully formed by the earth’s tectonic forces and massive volcanic eruptions, the mountains are a fascinating natural phenomenon, and this aerial journey will seek to discover the spectacular mountains of South Korea.

programme.title: Dannevirke / Norsewood
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Dannevirke / Norsewood"
programme.desc: Piri is in Manawatu in search of kina and paua. He goes rabbit shooting with the local “Ruahine Hunter” in Norsewood.

programme.title: Hokianga
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Hokianga"
programme.desc: Piri goes fishing for Snapper in Mitimiti, and has a go at drag-netting flounder in Whirinaki.

programme.title: Gisborne
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Gisborne"
programme.desc: Piri dives for Kina in Gisborne, and faces his fear of stingrays. Plus, he goes on a voyage on waka Tairawhiti, then visits Te Poho o Rawiri Marae.

programme.title: Manawatu / Whanganui
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Manawatu / Whanganui"
programme.desc: Piri goes in search of the illusive Samba deer near Marton. Plus a journey up the Whanganui River sees him chasing wild pigs.

programme.title: The Berg River
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Berg River"
programme.desc: While Xander gets an up-close look at the tranquil and isolated Kersefontein Farm, Adam becomes a true armchair adventurer, wishing he was experiencing anything besides snowy Canadian weather.

programme.title: The Majestic Cederberg
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Majestic Cederberg"
programme.desc: When Adam’s power goes out in Winnipeg, he decides to spend the day building a snow fort. Meanwhile, Xander and his crew take a trip through Cederberg.

programme.title: From Elands to Lamberts Bay
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "From Elands to Lamberts Bay"
programme.desc: Up next, Xander and his team stop to surf the legendary left break at Elands Bay. After experiencing the peace and tranquility of the ocean with South African locals, Xander and his team hit a snag in their journey.

programme.title: Volcan Madera, Nicaragua
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Volcan Madera, Nicaragua"
programme.desc: The brothers attain their goal of riding motorcycles to the heart of Nicaragua, through the jungle to the isolated beaches of the Pacific coast and back inland: through Spanish-colonial towns, local villages and the huge volcanic island of Ometepe.

programme.title: Yorkshire Dales, England
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Yorkshire Dales, England"
programme.desc: Imagine a 26-pub, 7-day, 60-mile pub-crawl! Doing a traditional ‘ramble’ through the stunning Yorkshire Dales region of northern England, the brother’s stride through the moors and dales and peaks and valleys - legs and livers intact.

programme.title: Erg Chigagga, Sahara, Morocco
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Erg Chigagga, Sahara, Morocco"
programme.desc: From Marrakesh, the brothers take a series of local Berber taxis over the High Atlas Mountains and down into the Draa Valley until the road ends at the edge of the great sand sea of the Sahara where they bury some treasure.

programme.title: Tokyo
programme.desc: Local Exploring in Tokyo is like nothing else. Josh and Lexi Limitless visit the crowded streets, a screaming Monster Cafe and an abandoned ‘Love Hotel’.

programme.title: Nikko
programme.desc: Epic Exploring: Going Local is back in Japan in Nikko as Cody, reunited with Sherman Mak, explores a derelict onsen and an amusement park called Western Village.

programme.title: Goat
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Travel with a Goat S1 - "Goat"
programme.desc: Two foodies travel through Kenya with an animal. Will they decide to have the animal slaughtered after spending three days together with it?

programme.title: Alpaca
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Travel with a Goat S1 - "Alpaca"
programme.desc: Two foodies travel through Peru with an animal. Will they decide to have the animal slaughtered after spending three days together with it?

programme.desc: Two foodies travel through Bulgaria with an animal. Will they decide to have the animal slaughtered after spending three days together with it?

programme.title: Day 2
programme.desc: Jalou has 24 hours to get from Barcelona to Tarragona where she conquers the Catalonian mountains with her mountain bike. Kevin tries to beat her in Slovenia.

programme.title: Day 3
programme.desc: Kevin leaves civilization behind in Suriname, while thousands of kilometers away, Jalou has to go literally through the trees in an Australian forest.

programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Cape Runaway"
programme.desc: Piri visits Opotiki to check out the infamous Horse Sports. Then Piri goes fishing off the rocks for at Cape Runaway with local, Rawiri Waititi.

programme.desc: Piri visits Bluff. Diving for paua, fishing for Blue Cod and lunch with the Mayor of Invercargill, Tim Shadbolt.

programme.desc: Piri heads to Hicks Bay to try and catch kahawai surfcasting. Then Piri meets experienced angler and kuia in Lottin Point to fish for Blue Mau Mau.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Angry over her arrest, a woman becomes combative with officers. Busted once again for drugs, a smart young woman knows she is making dumb choices but can’t stop using. A man eluding the police swipes food from his workplace before landing in jail. Officers get a laugh from an arrested panhandler who wants to buy a permit for panhandling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Las Vegas Motor Mouth
programme.desc: A belligerent man with a grudge is placed in a restraint chair. An intoxicated woman receives a love note from an inmate on worker status.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man brought in for trespassing becomes violent. A sex worker admits she۪s witholding her pediculosis condition from clients. A woman explains her tattoos are a reminder of the women she loved.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman tries to conceal illegal substances in her bra. Bandmates are charged for tresspassing, and two inmates are separated and placed in restraints after losing control.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman refuses to wear jail-issued clothing. A man tells his tearful tale to officers, and a chatty inebriated woman is placed in isolation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After cutting her head, a woman bites and kicks deputies. To investigate potential hidden meanings, a man’s tattoos are examined. A confused man is found with illegal mushrooms at a bus stop.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E17 Gone to the Dogs
programme.desc: Officers find hidden drugs on a burglary suspect during a pat down that leads to a tense confrontation. A beer sets off a fight between a mom and her daughter causing one family member to end up in jail. A rare event takes place in the county jail - a woman arrested for a warrant is in a good mood. Punching a pit bull while drunk lands in man in jail where he comes face to face with a childhood hero.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated inmate escapes his restraints. A young woman denies she abused her mother, and a guard removes an inmate who is causing a disturbance.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Guards uncover grooming aids stashed in an unlikely spot while combing through a womans things. An incarcerated tourist threatens to bring in Johnny Cochran for his defense, and a drunk driver awakens to find X-rated artwork drawn on his body.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman tries to conceal illegal substances in her bra. Bandmates are charged for tresspassing, and two inmates are separated and placed in restraints after losing control.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A fight involving female detainees breaks out after one woman accuses the other of staring at her. A man is arrested for shattering the hotel glass door as a result of a fight. An old crooner believes that rap stars are going to bail him out of jail. Handcuffs don’t stop a woman from trying to flirt with an officer.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In San Diego, CA an officer grapples with a combative detainee. In Portland, OR six party goers are taken into custody. In Fort Worth, TX a high-risk inmate manages to get the key to his handcuffs.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A couple is taken into custody for lewd and indecent exposure. An intoxicated woman believes that she is being treated unfairly, and a man with an existing wrap sheet is busted.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman who was nabbed for jaywalking claims the police were out of line for arresting her. A woman is brought in on domestic-violence charges, and a drug peddler claims hes selling to support his addiction to poker.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman stalking David Copperfield is arrested. An inebriated inmate voices her displeasure with the guards, and a man nabbed for driving under the influence of prescription drugs howls for his dog.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A Batman impressionist is arrested after punching Chewbacca. A broken arm doesn’t stop a woman from struggling with officers. A man finds out it’s better to pay the fine then do the time. A woman involved in an affair with an older gentleman claims she was set up.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man believes he is an alien wrongfully arrested for obstruction. Claiming to be a law school student, a man just doesn’t understand why he was arrested for trespassing. A woman claims she swallowed her friend’s pills for good reason. A family reunion ends with a bruised and bloodied husband.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A transient man tries to resist the officers in booking then serenades them with a song. A difficult inmate blames his behavior on various medical conditions, and a woman claims to be Jesus Christ.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Deputies deal with chaos after volatile inmates begin fighting. Accusations of deceit plague a booking as a woman is arrested for drunk driving. Prisoners are restrained after causing a commotion.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E19 A Night of Fights
programme.desc: A man tries to swallow his ring. A heroin addict wants help when he realizes his habit has cost him everything he loves. One man fights with his girlfriend in a bathroom, another fights with his girlfriend at home, both are surprised they are arrested for domestic violence. A habitual criminal is worried that other inmates will fight over him.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Cousins come to jail together but only one leaves. Officers contend the best they can with an unruly inmate. Naked meditation in a parking lot lands a street artist in jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An arrested man is caught on camera making a run for freedom. An addict returns to jail and tells officers that meth is controlling his mind. Humility may be the key for one man to quit his life of crime. A shoplifter calls 9-1-1 to help him get out of jail.

programme.title: Jail
