programme.title: USA: The end of oil - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - USA: The end of oil - Part 1
programme.desc: "The end of oil" is the amazing story of a raw material which has revolutionized mans life in just a century. But today, oil reserves are depleting. In his crazy race for always more production, Man didnt manage to preserve this precious energy that took million years for the Earth to give out. To tell the adventure of oil, Yann Arthus-Bertrand and his team went to the United States, the country which depends the most on black gold. At the start of the 21st century, it is now urgent to realize that oil resources are limited. Its today that we have to act and get organized, in order to prepare the new era to come. While all our economies are based on the petrol barrels price, well...

programme.title: A la carte grills
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - A la carte grills
programme.desc: If youre a nature enthusiast and a fan of outdoor cooking, the upcoming season is perfect for barbecue enthusiasts! Our journey will take us to Aube, nestled in the heart of the Brevonnes forest, and then to the Massif des Bauges, where grilling and snow create a unique combination. Afterward, well explore the Libournais region, where well uncover cooking techniques that make use of vine shoots, which are plentiful in the area. Just a short distance from the vineyards, well arrive at another corner of Gironde, the Blaye region, where the cooking method remains consistent but features a distinctly local ingredient: eel.

This new concept store offers the opportunity to make Vinyasa yoga wearing a trendy outfit, treat yourself to a revitalizing juice detox before heading to a Cryotherapy session without leaving the venue! For a relaxing time after an intensive Vinyasa yoga session, Val takes you to a session of Fire cupping where the heath is ideal for getting rid of muscular pains from day-to-day stress.

programme.title: Acro Yoga on a Skyscraper
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Acro Yoga on a Skyscraper

Then, in the heart of Downtown, Val will experience a glass slide down one of the tallest towers in California. Shell also try SandBox Fitness, the trendy indoor surfing class, before trying Lazerfit, a new way to work out that combines warm-up, stretching and laser tag.

programme.title: Seashells on the menu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - Seashells on the menu
programme.desc: We will start this journey near La Rochelle to learn a little more about the breeding of the famous bouchot mussels but also a very particular technique to cook them. We will then go on a tour of Frances best oysters: towards Cancale, Arcachon, Montpellier and finally Oleron to learn about the different breeding methods and to find out more about all the species in France. Julie will cook a fricassee of berniques, the little Chinese hats that cover the rocks of the coast, as well as pink clams that are little known to the public. We will continue our journey in Finistère to meet Sylvain, the only abalone breeder in the country, and then to Meru where there are still workshops magnifying...

programme.desc: Val Kahl is taking you to discover the newest innovation in town for rejuvenation, body cleansing, and boost the body nutrition. She visits Matcha Box: the shops where you can find all drinks and food using “matcha” as the base ingredients. After trying out the refreshing matcha beverages, Val passes by the Willow Spa to experience the famous Enzyme Bath. Before stepping into the hot bath full of enzyme, Val took a sip of enzyme and ginger tea to detoxify and relax the muscles!

programme.title: Women Kundalini Yoga
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Women Kundalini Yoga
programme.desc: Its an expedition in the heart of nature that is waiting for you during this day with Val Kahl. This journey begins at the top of Mount Ojai for a Kundalini Yoga session with the organization Women Kundalini Yoga. This breathtaking view of the region will allow you to fully grasp your emotions and embrace the positive energy of this group of spiritual women. Finally, the botanical garden of Santa Barbara will open up to you so to admire the well preserved variety of Californian flora as you make your way through the first botanical salon in the USA.

programme.title: How to install a plant in the garden
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - How to install a plant in the garden

In our last episode, we saw how to plant a small seed to make it germinate and give a plant, it’s called a "seedling". To go faster, you can also buy or collect small plants that you will install in your garden. Thats what well see today.

programme.desc: In this episode we decided to make an Acai bowl. For this you will need frozen bananas, milk, acai powder, kiwi, berries, chia seeds and edible flowers. Acai is a small berry, a remarkable concentrate of antioxidants that help fight against premature aging of cells and thus prevent the onset of cardiovascular disease.

programme.title: Yesmin
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 3 - Yesmin
programme.desc: Born in Mexico but always attracted to new cultures and countries, Yesmin worked many jobs until she finally found her calling. She decided to merge her passions for art and travel and became a “Vagabond Artist”. She is now able to travel the world while making a living by painting beautiful murals in her own distinct style.

programme.title: Jessica
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 3 - Jessica
programme.desc: Jessica’s life as a teenager was marked by a family tragedy that she struggled to cope with for a long time. Her anxiety had reached an all-time high and she was experiencing regular panic attacks when finally, she discovered surfing. This newfound passion thoroughly changed her lifestyle, ultimately resulting in a move to Bali, Indonesia. Today, she runs mindful surf and yoga retreats while also working online as a wellness writer.

programme.title: Lisa and Pete
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 3 - Lisa and Pete
programme.desc: Two urbanites surprise themselves by changing their city lifestyles for farm living : Lisa, an architect based in London, and her husband Pete, an actor seen in Hollywoodian movies such as “Ghost in the Shell” alongside Scarlett Johansson and a rock star in his own right in his native Malaysia. Together, they figured they were far from being ready for retirement. Instead, they dove headfirst into running an organic farm where they now both thrive while taking pleasure in returning to a simpler life.

programme.title: Meet the parents
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Family - Season 1 - Meet the parents
programme.desc: Today, we will meet Clara and Gianni. They already have a child but they’re expecting twins soon. We will also meet Coralie and Florent who have known each other since Kindergarten. Today they live the perfect love and they’re expecting a baby daughter. Kim, a young pregnant woman didn’t expect that and her boyfriend Pierre who can’tdeal with the situation deserted the scene three months before the delivery. Finally, Nathalie and Naoufel are not beginners: two boys and a baby girl on the way, much to the father’s delight! They’re making their way to the echography room with a light heart.

programme.title: Tough pregnancies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Family - Season 1 - Tough pregnancies
programme.desc: Clara and Gianni are worried, since a pregnancy with twins is always riskier. She’s due in two months, and has already undergone two medical interventions. Kim, nineteen, is fine physically, but she has to face her family’s criticism: she still lives at her parent’s, and the absence of the father-to-be worries them a great deal. Coralie would rather be safe than sorry, and meets with a prenatal consultant. Her nightmare: being turned down for an epidural procedure... Nathalie and Naoufel are looking at the bright side of life and are chilling on granddaddy’s boat, before letting themselves enjoy a family photo shoot.

programme.title: Do wild animals still exist ? - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 2 - Do wild animals still exist ? - Part 1
programme.desc: Animals represent 2/3 of the species on earth. We are increasingly concerned about our impact on the world. But what place does man have for the wild animal? Discover how it is possible to reintroduce wild animals in South Africa, or the disaster that took place with the sea lions in Namibia, and also how to preserve rhinos or other animals in biodiversity. There, women and men manage to protect wildlife every day.

Then she will have a cooking class to discover the Italian recipes of the hotels chef. She will also enjoy relaxing treatments at the spa in the hotels green park.

programme.title: Lamb flavors
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - Lamb flavors
programme.desc: Tender and tasty, lamb plays a key role in festive cuisine but also in everyday cuisine. Julie sets off on the French roads to discover the different breeds existing across the country. It must be said that France has one of the most varied productions in the world. There are more than forty breeds listed in 5 categories. But more than the breed, it is the way in which they are fed that interests connoisseurs. Julie introduces us to producers and cooks of this refined dish!

programme.title: Urban Garden Mezzanine
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Urban Garden Mezzanine

Along with Chef Timothy Hollingsworth, she prepares a fresh mix salad in the Urban Garden Mezzanine, an organic vertical garden on a rooftop of the Otium contemporary restaurant. After doing a bit of market sightseeing along the way, she heads out to Amazebowls where she can’t resist making the famous Acai Bowl for herself!

programme.title: Pilates on Trampoline
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Pilates on Trampoline
programme.desc: Its in Newport, Orange County, that were going for a pilates on trampoline class with the uplifting company Bouncing Society. programme.title: Ika
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 3 - Ika
programme.desc: After graduating with a Law degree, Ika built a career as a legal manager and advisor. For a decade she worked on risk-related matters. One day, she decided to take a big calculated risk of her own and give up her law-life to pursue a passion for jewelry-making. Her creations are inspired by her travels and the natural materials surrounding her.

programme.title: Hansen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 3 - Hansen
programme.desc: A former model and Sports News anchor, Hansen has drifted away from the limelight to focus on a personal journey. His Yoga trip began 10 years ago, after suffering a herniated disc injury. His experiences have taught him that the only way one can truly change the world is to raise the consciousness of humanity, and this actually starts within ourselves.

programme.title: Mark, Camille and Juliana
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 3 - Mark, Camille and Juliana
programme.desc: A Filipino couple with a shared love for traveling decide to change their lives and explore a passion for eco-tourism. Their glamping tents are perched on the hills of Bacuit Bay and promise a natural and enriching experience. Daily sunset yoga sessions and Farm-to-Table dining are just some of the activities they share with their guests. Their energy attracts like-minded people on similar journeys, notably their yoga teacher Juliana who has an inspiring story of her own to share with us.

programme.title: Last preps
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Family - Season 1 - Last preps
programme.desc: Clara and Gianni’s boys are born! But they came in a little bit early, and have been admitted in neonatal resuscitation... Coralie and Florent are still walking on clouds as they wait for their daughter, Lena. So are Nathalie and Naoufel, who arrange a tour of the future baby’s bedroom. Things are still tense between Kim and her parents. Her father blames here for having left school too early and the family makes no effort to hide their dislike of Pierre, the would-be father, who is still a no-show. They go as far as opposing Kim’s preferred choice for the future boy’s name, since it was his father that came up with the idea...

programme.title: Welcome in a new world
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Family - Season 1 - Welcome in a new world
programme.desc: All the babies are born! How are Clara and Gianni coping with the situation with two newborn children at home? Does this help them to mourn the loss of their unborn second baby? Was Coralie allowed her much-desired epidural? Did Pierre came back at Kim’s side to finally act as the father, and what name did Kim settle upon for her son? In the end, it is Nathalie and Naoufel, our most experienced parents, who share with us some words of wisdom: “one isn’t just born being a parent, one has to learn it.”

programme.title: Do wild animals still exist ? - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 2 - Do wild animals still exist ? - Part 2
programme.desc: Yann Arthus-Bertrand surprises us with preserved landscapes. And sometimes even with vast spaces where mans imprint remains invisible. Yann Arthus-Bertrand continues his world tour in favour of the protection of the environment and wildlife. From the tip of the African continent, he decides to take down the fences to let the animals roam freely, then he takes us to Cambodia to see if the tigers will disappear. Then we head to London to follow the chimpanzee or to France to study and save the bees.

Youll be guided throughout the entire exercise so that in the end, youll be able to learn from your past experience and open up to others in a similar way.

programme.title: Greece, Euphoria Retreat
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Reset - Season 1 - Greece, Euphoria Retreat
programme.desc: In this episode of Reset, embark on a transformative journey to Euphoria Retreat.A mystical place offering a holistic approach to well-being aimed at restoring balance between body, mind and soul.After a long struggle with illness, its founder embarked on a personal quest to find balance. An in-depth reflection which resulted in the creation of a place where one could share and transmit this method of well-being. Euphoria Retreat is a clever blend of Taoist and Hellenic philosophy based on the symbolism of the five elements: water, wood, fire, earth and metal. Ancestral wisdom and scientific advances offer a transformative immersion in self-discovery. The tools developed by Euphoria...

programme.title: Italy, Palazzo Fiuggi
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Reset - Season 1 - Italy, Palazzo Fiuggi
programme.desc: In this episode of Reset we discover Palazzo Fiuggi, a haven of well-being located in the heart of the natural springs of Fiuggi, famous for their purifying and healing powers.The Palazzo was born from the vision of a science and health enthusiast. This historic place of well-being offers exclusive medical-scientific therapies combining the healing properties of water with advances in Western medicine and alternative medicines. Upon arrival, a team of specialists carries out a targeted diagnosis to create a personalized protocol, rebalancing the mind, body and soul, with a simple promise: offering a longer and better-lived life.A constantly evolving method, between ancestral wisdom and...

programme.title: Poultry on the menu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - Poultry on the menu
programme.desc: Julie heads for Burgundy to discover ancient breeds of poultry reintroduced to France thanks to the work of breeder Fred Menager. Well then move on to Auvergne to discover how the famous Label Rouge is awarded and the role of certifying bodies ... because its important to know what ends up on our plates. Julie also travels to the Drôme to cook guinea fowl, before heading to the Perigord to prepare a turkey stew. Julie will then head back up towards the center to discover an amazing fly maker who uses rooster feathers!

programme.title: Floating Yoga
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Floating Yoga
programme.desc: Just Float, this is the latest yoga trend and mantra for an relaxed mind. As you enter a fully soundproof studio and float in vats filled with epson salts, you will disconnect from the urban buzz. That is Val’s promise as she takes us to experience this funny trend. With a sain mind comes a sain body: it’s time to head to Clover Juice, the most famous juice address in Los Angeles. As we make our way through Clover’s kitchen, we discover this way of life, mix and learn more on these beverage’s benefits.

programme.title: Animal Farm
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Animal Farm
programme.desc: In this episode, we will go to a ranch, which is a real sanctuary for animals. The animals are king and the llama is the star. This center takes in animals to give them a safer and happier life in a beautiful setting. Then Val will participate in a Namastday Yoga session, another trend in yoga involving ropes hanging from the ceiling, acrobatic poses and great flexibility.

programme.title: Planting vegetables in the fall
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Planting vegetables in the fall
programme.desc: We meet in the market garden of Romainville, to continue installing vegetables in the vegetable garden. Yes, it is possible, even in autumn. Because if its true that most vegetables are planted in spring or summer, some varieties can be planted in early autumn and are fast-growing, which will allow you to harvest them in late autumn or early winter. Lets get started! Were going to plant winter spinach together and well show you a little trick you need to know to harvest it properly.

programme.title: Claire
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 3 - Claire
programme.desc: One woman’s personal mission to reduce her household rubbish turned into a passion that gave birth to Southeast Asia’s first Zero-Waste Bulk Food shop. Claire is a driven and successful mother of three who turned away from her corporate job to channel her business-savvy into reducing our impact on the environment and contributing to the improvement of her local community.

programme.title: Zaira (Argentina)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Zaira (Argentina)
programme.desc: For a long time Zaira let herself be defined solely as a survivor of the traumatic sexual assault that marked her life. In her healing search, she left behind the busy city life and moved to seek solace in the mountains of Mendoza. It is among these magnificent peaks that Zaira found peace within herself and harmony with her surroundings. Now, eager to help others heal, she is the leader of a trekking initiative that doubles as a support group for other women who are victims of sexual aggression.

programme.title: Ile (Argentina)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Ile (Argentina)
programme.desc: Ileana studied business and worked long hours indoors for a multinational logistics company. Her love for dance and desire for movement drove her to quit her corporate life and begin a new chapter as a fitness trainer. Quickly exhausting the traditional methods available at her local gyms, she began to create innovative and groundbreaking exercise methods of her own. Her goal: to empower women by making them feel strong and feminine at the same time.

programme.title: So the great rivers may live - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 2 - So the great rivers may live - Part 1
programme.desc: Water and its beauty, water and its power, water and its fragility... the water we all need is becoming scarce, through our own fault. Some rivers are dry, others are diverted, cut off by dams, others are simply polluted, and this for decades. We will discover how humans transformed the nature in Argentina, then in China and its disproportionate Three Gorges Dam. We will also go in Botswana with the Okavango, this unique river which flows into a desert forming the famous Okavango Delta. Vu du Ciel makes you discover once again another world, magnificent but threatened.

programme.title: Differential relaxation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 5 - Differential relaxation
programme.desc: This exercise helps you develop what we call differential relaxation. The aim is to learn to relax the entire body except the parts necessary to the proper development of an action. For example, when youre working in the office, your back and your arms are often extremely contracted when really only your eyes and hands are involved in the task.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Reset - Season 1 - France, Le Bruit de leau
programme.desc: In this episode of Reset, we take you to “Le Bruit de leau”, an ecolodge nestled in the heart of the Baie de Somme nature reserve, in France. In the middle of nature, discover a place of absolute serenity inspired by the Japanese lifestyle and the travels of a great reporter, its founder.The intimate atmosphere that reigns at Le Bruit de leau (The Sound of Water) envelops you in a soothing calm, creating a cocoon made for relaxation and personal rejuvenation.This ecolodge allows us to cultivate awareness of the present moment and to open up to a fulfilling perception of our environment. Le Bruit de leau opens the doors to a transformative experience, where beauty of the natural...

programme.title: Sri Lanka, Santani
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Reset - Season 1 - Sri Lanka, Santani
programme.desc: In this episode of Reset, we fly to Sri Lanka to discover an old tea plantation transformed into a sumptuous refuge: Santani.In order to find an alternative to the stress of urban life, the hotel offers a modern approach to Ayurveda. This traditional Indian medicine aims to establish a balance between the individual and the world around them. Thanks to the development of a personalized program, each visitor is invited to find harmony within this restorative sanctuary.Santani was created by a Sri Lankan eager to preserve our physical and spiritual well-being in a peaceful and healthy place to reconnect with the world differently. Lets discover a holistic approach to health, including...

programme.title: The flavors of chocolate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - The flavors of chocolate
programme.desc: Today, the gluttons should not be disappointed since chocolate is in the spotlight. Discovered by the Mayans 2500 years ago and then more widely by the Aztecs, chocolate is today one of the favorite products in the world. And make no mistake about it: just as the kitchen has its great chefs, chocolate also has its great chocolatiers.As for recipes, Julie will introduce you to a cake that is only made in Saint Émilien and which combines chocolate with macarons, before heading to the Basque Country for a dessert to spice you up. We will then climb up the mountain to meet a Swiss cook. Finally, you will see that chocolate has several surprises in store for us: it has many virtues and is...

programme.title: Hotel on Pacific
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Hotel on Pacific
programme.desc: Val takes us to one of the most beautiful hotels in California: The Belmont Hotel! Much more than a hotel, this place is a natural haven where everything is made to relax while overlooking the Pacific. While relaxation is key, we also seek adventures, don’t we? While in this dream setting, we will practice yoga among the turtles, walk around the vertical and organic garden with the Chef and treat ourselves with a massage with essential oils coming directly from the garden.

programme.title: Surfing and Vineyards
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Surfing and Vineyards
programme.desc: Yoga and Surf are two corner stones of the Californian spirit. In this episode, the best of both worlds meets as Val shares a surf session with a local champion from Malibu! What about the surfing outfit ? No need for it, there is a yoga mat. Let’s head to Ojai, in the middle of a vineyards, and joint the "Topa Wines" group for a yoga session at the sunset. Together, we will enjoy the "Pink moment": the time when Ojai’s mountains turn pink and your mind is blown away.

programme.title: Repotting an indoor plant
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Repotting an indoor plant
programme.desc: We meet in the market garden of Romainville to learn how to take good care of our indoor plants. The plants that grow in our houses and flats are grown in pots. And when we buy a new plant, it is very important to repot it. The plants we buy come in pots that are often too small for them to grow well. Thats why you put it in a bigger pot.

programme.title: Agostina (Argentina)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Agostina (Argentina)
programme.desc: When Agostina’s mother was diagnosed with breast cancer, she began seeking out soft natural fabrics that would not irritate her mother’s sensitive skin. She found it almost impossible to find the right materials, so she decided to make her own. Research led her to bamboo fibers and she realised she could make a positive impact on the environment, while developing sustainable and ethical fashion.

programme.title: Solenn (Nantes)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Solenn (Nantes)
programme.desc: A former school teacher reinvents herself when she discovers a passion for sharing other women’s stories. Always inspired by the journeys of strong women, Solenn began a blog to celebrate the women in her community. Solenn’s energy and passion fueled a dream of starting her own magazine. Thanks to a successful crowdfunding campaign, this dream blossomed into a professional career in journalism and she launched a print mook (magazine and book) called Etonnantes. Etonnantes features interviews of women of all backgrounds, celebrating their diversity and success in each field.

programme.title: Sophie (Nantes)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Sophie (Nantes)
programme.desc: Always an artist at heart, Sophie grew up in the countryside amongst nature and farm animals. Her love for creating art while respecting nature turned into a drive to seek out sustainable vegetable dyes.Today, her artwork and craft are intertwined as she makes beautiful prints and motifs that she colours with natural dyes, prepared from handpicked variety of flowers and plants that turn into stunning creations.

programme.title: So the great rivers may live - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 2 - So the great rivers may live - Part 2
programme.desc: Yann Arthus-Bertrand thus continues his world tour and his inventory of the planet with the great rivers that suffer from mans excesses as a common thread. " So the great rivers may live" is the discovery of places, men and women who are fighting so that our waterways simply have their place on Earth. Thanks to his genius, man is correcting his mistakes: the Aral Sea, which once disappeared, is coming back. In New York, millions of people have drinking water thanks to the natural virtues of the forest.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 6 - Self-massage for the leg
programme.desc: No time to relax and get a massage? These exercises let you relax by massaging yourself.

programme.title: Joint relaxation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 5 - Joint relaxation
programme.desc: The joints are the first parts of the body to react badly to stress, therefore it is essential to relax and relieve them as often as possible. Some ankle and knee rotations, combined with calm, controlled breathing will allow you to soothe your joints. With a few simple, well-targeted exercises, this session will bring you deep relaxation.

programme.title: Exercises to activate the muscles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 1 - Exercises to activate the muscles
programme.desc: Need to regenerate your body? Take the time to make some exercices to decompress and find a peaceful harmony.

programme.title: Self-massage for the back and shoulder
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 6 - Self-massage for the back and shoulder
programme.desc: Bad posture and sagging shoulders are behaviors which can cause our body to suffer. MyZen TV offers a series of four exercises to massage your own back and shoulders. Practicing these simple and effective exercises can easily allow you to relax.

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Of Forests and Men - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 2 - Of Forests and Men - Part 2
programme.desc: The call of the Forest is about discovering places but above all it is about meeting those who protect this priceless heritage. Forests are essential to mankind. They capture CO2, promote the formation of clouds and therefore rain, protect the soil from erosion and provide a habitat for wildlife. From Madagascar, to France, to Cameroon, or even Eritrea, Yann Arthus-Bertrand sets out to discover the most beautiful forests, those who live in them, those who protect them and those who live off them.

programme.title: The cheese menu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - The cheese menu
programme.desc: Today, Julie sets on the roads of France to talk about an essential product on French tables: cheese. More than a gourmet craze, more than an end-of-meal treat, cheese is associated with French gastronomy, and is also recognized as Intangible Cultural Heritage by UNESCO. With nearly 1,000 varieties (soft cheeses, cooked, blue-veined, pressed cheeses…), the French are the biggest consumers of cheese in the world!

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Martial Arts and meditation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Martial Arts and meditation
programme.desc: Today, we will meet in Santa Monica in the hub of the last healthy trends. Val will make us discover Erewhon, the biggest organic and hipster supermarket in Los Angeles. She will then meet Troy, a guru of healthy consciousness, for an outdoor class that mixes martial arts and meditation. Then, on the legendary "Muscle Beach", the beach of all athletes, we will meet David, an action movie double, for a very aerial workout.

programme.title: Hotel Paseo, Palm Springs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Hotel Paseo, Palm Springs
programme.desc: Val takes us to discover Palm Springs, the trendy and designer city in the heart of the California desert. In the heart of a private collection, we will discover all the flora of this region: an outdoor plant museum, one of the largest collections of cacti, and even tequila flowers. Then well head to the Paseo Hotel, one of the zen and design hotels of Palm Springs, where well meet the chef of the restaurant who will concoct his signature dishes. We will end our day with a relaxing massage with crystals.

programme.title: Carving a Halloween pumpkin
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Carving a Halloween pumpkin
programme.desc: We meet again in the market garden of Romainville, for a special Halloween episode. In one of our first episodes, we learned how to sow a pumpkin seed. The pumpkins, which I had installed in my vegetable garden, have grown well now that we are in autumn. And thats good because today were going to show you how to dig a pumpkin to make a beautiful Halloween lantern.

programme.title: Potato cutlets with vegetable puree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Potato cutlets with vegetable puree
programme.desc: In this recipe, well prepare delicious potato cutlets accompanied by a creamy vegetable puree. The cutlets are crispy on the outside with Japanese breadcrumbs and tender on the inside, while the celeriac puree adds a touch of sweetness and lightness. This dish is perfect for a comforting and tasty vegetarian meal.

programme.title: Creamy cauliflower soup
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Creamy cauliflower soup
programme.desc: In this recipe, well prepare a creamy, comforting cauliflower and celeriac veloute. This mild, delicate soup is spiced up with condiments like paprika, garlic and oregano, and a touch of olive oil for an even more gourmet texture. An ideal dish for a light starter or a warming dinner.

programme.title: Paul John Elliott
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Paul John Elliott
programme.desc: Without really knowing why, Paul Elliott will change his life from cartoonist to massage therapist. Aspired by success, money, success, he will create several clinics and will eventually lose the human aspects and lose himself. A new turn, a new meeting and Paul will finally resume his dreams of painting. Follow Paul in his tumults and his happiness found.

programme.title: Annabelle Higgins and Valérie Sirois
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Annabelle Higgins and Valérie Sirois
programme.desc: They are beautiful sisters, they are passionate about nature and they have a very strong common point: entrepreneurship. After years of evolution in consumer sectors, discover Annabelle and Valerie who knew how to listen to their passion to create a fitness and surf club (for Annabelle) and a zero waste grocery store (for Valerie).

programme.title: Véronick Desmarais
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Véronick Desmarais
programme.desc: The everyday work is not always easy and it is sometimes difficult to get by. If there is one thing that Veronick has learned from her experience and those around her, it is because she is able to surpass that and to embark on her dreams and plans to become a massage therapist. You will believe in your abilities too.

programme.title: Violaine Courtois
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Violaine Courtois
programme.desc: Everything started from the dream of her parents, she becomes a veterinarian. In her career that she launched backwards, Violaine will meet people who will take her to a different path of life. The chance will be at the rendezvous but it is especially the courage to resume studies and create his company that will build his project. Follow the encounters and travels of Violaine that brought her to fasciatherapy and nonviolent communication.

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Gabon - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - Nature’s Heroes: Gabon - Part 2
programme.desc: The incredible diversity of flora and fauna, the fight against climate change, the balance between growth and sustainable development: these are all battles being fought on five continents. Yann Arthus-Bertrand takes us on this expedition. Were off to Gabon to discover the Ivindo National Park and Port-Gentil, then on to Sri Lanka in Kandi. Back to Gabon we go to Libreville, then Lambarene to talk about turtles and the health of the local people. Finally, off to Dhaka-Bangladesh.

programme.title: Simple Session 2025 - BMX Finals WOMEN
programme.desc: Simple Session is back at Unibet Arena in Tallinn, Estonia – celebrating its massive 25-year anniversary! A quarter-century of mind-blowing BMX riding and skateboarding, unforgettable moments, and a global community of athletes pushing the limits.

programme.title: GKA Kitesurfing World Tour - The Stars of Wave
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge ist es wieder Zeit fur die GKA Kitesurfing World Tour 2023. Nachdem wir bereits das Highlight der Kitesurfing Freestyler gesehen haben, gehen wir nun zu den Kite-Surf Wave Athleten uber und rekapitulieren das Highlight der ersten Saisonhalfte. Lets check out!

programme.title: Athlete profile: climber Lindsey Hamms (USA) journey from concrete to peaks
programme.desc: Mammut athlete Lindsey Hamm, a professional mountaineer and mountain guide, brings a breath of fresh air to the world of mountaineering. This film gives an insight into her life and a recent expedition to the wild Charakusa Valley in Pakistan

programme.title: Swatch Freeride World Tour 2015 - 20th Anniversary Xtreme Verbier - Part 1
programme.desc: 2015 is the year of the 20th anniversary of Xtreme Verbier. As the legendary wall of the Bec des Rosses has always been one of the most spectacular places for freeriding and has also hosted the final of the Freeride World Tour for years, it is now time to look back!

programme.title: Swatch Freeride World Tour 2015 - 20th Anniversary Xtreme Verbier - Part 2
programme.desc: 2015 is the year of the 20th anniversary of Xtreme Verbier. As the legendary wall of the Bec des Rosses has always been one of the most spectacular places for freeriding and has also hosted the final of the Freeride World Tour for years, it is now time to look back!

programme.title: Bike2Boat
programme.desc: In the Bike 2 Boat adventurewe set off on a climate-neutral journey through the Alps together with four kayakers. We will accompany them on their search for extraordinary kayak spots and unforgettable experiences.

programme.title: A Song for Tomorrow
programme.desc: This April, Mayan Smith-Gobat and Ben Rueck joined Chinas renowned mountaineers Liu Yongbang (Abond) and Xiao Ting on an expedition to explore the Qingfeng Valley on the border of Zhangjiajie, Chinas first and largest national park.

programme.desc: The third FWT Challenger delivered an unforgettable day full of action on the legendary Mont Gond wall. Perfect conditions for the 63 riders from all over Europe, the USA, New Zealand and Japan.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour is looking forward to returning to the Cape Verdean island of Sal to open the 2024 season with the discipline of kite surfing. In February, the best kite-surfing athletes will compete against each other at the Kite-Surf World Cup

programme.title: Chasing Dreams -Episode 5
programme.desc: A thrilling journey through Chasing Dreams, where every trail becomes a battleground for victory. From the peaks of the Basque Country to the routes of Chamonix, witness the determination of trail runners as they chase their dreams on the Golden Trail World Series.

programme.title: Chasing Dreams -Episode 6
programme.desc: A thrilling journey through Chasing Dreams, where every trail becomes a battleground for victory. From the peaks of the Basque Country to the routes of Chamonix, witness the determination of trail runners as they chase their dreams on the Golden Trail World Series.

programme.title: The Mt. Logan Wanderers
programme.desc: At 5959m, Mount Logan is the 2nd highest peak in North America, and certainly one of the wildest mountains in the world. To reach it, Helias Millerioux, Alex Marchesseau, Thomas Delfino, and Gregory Douillard did not choose the easy option.

programme.title: FIA – Intercontinental Drifting Cup 2021
programme.desc: In todays Episode we´re pulling the handbreak tight and put the pedal to the medal with the best professional drift driver. The Intercontinental Drifting Cup took place in Riga, Lativa this year. Cars up to 850 horse powers and a challenging track!

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour
programme.desc: The E-Tour de Haute Tarentaise is the race for expert bikers looking for adrenaline and pushing themselves to the limit. It constitutes the kick-off of the E-Bike World Tour.

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs
programme.desc: The Red Bull Romaniacs Extreme Enduro Rally is open! From today until Saturday, the best hard enduro riders will take on the toughest rally in the world in Romania! The Red Bull Romaniacs takes place every year and attracts participants from around 50 countries.

programme.title: Extremsportveko
programme.desc: Today, we travel all the way up to Voss, the adventure Capital of Norway, where the “Extremesportsveko” takes place once a year. During this week, national and international athletes compete and challenge themselves in their elements.

programme.title: APP – History, Legacy and Best Moments
programme.desc: In this weeks episode we´re taking a closer Look at the APP, the association of paddleboard professionals. From the contests, to the unique trips and fascinating personalities. So, grab you boardshorts and sunglasses. Today we´re going to the beach.

programme.title: Kayak Expedition Norway
programme.desc: Today’s episode is an exciting show about a unique kayak expedition to Norway’s white-water treasures at the Arctic Circle. Expect remote mountains, raging rivers and challenging rapids!

programme.title: Emocean - Surf Documentary
programme.desc: Today we take you on an unparalleled surf trip to some of the most famous, as well most terrifying waves on the planet. We will listen to some intimate stories of extraordinary people literally living IN and WITH the ocean.

programme.title: Meet Connor Herson
programme.desc: Connor Herson pushes the limits of what is possible on the rock. But his latest and greatest challenge? Balancing a life climbing cutting edge ascents with his studies at Stanford.

programme.title: Engadin Snow
programme.desc: The ENGADINSNOW by Dakine is widely known as an extraordinary freeride event in front of a backdrop with the fascinating snowy mountain tops of the Swiss Canton of Grisons. This unique parallel freeride format pairs two riders in a team.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2024 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Season Wrap Up

programme.title: Motosurf World Championship - Båstad (SWE)
programme.desc: Set against the stunning backdrop of the Swedish coastline, the world’s best motosurfers are ready to go head-to-head. Speed, skill, and pure passion - these are the ingredients for thrilling races on the water. Who will claim the title here in Båstad?

programme.title: Freestyle Pro Tour
programme.desc: Today we are visiting the Windsurfers paradise which is why the Freestyle Pro Tour is visiting it every year for its biggest event of the season. This will be the first ever FPT event that runs all three Freestyle windsurfing disciplines at the same time.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 – Jericoacoara (BRA) – Overall Highlights

programme.title: Oetztal Cycle Marathon
programme.desc: Der Ötztaler Radmarathon feiert sein 40-jahriges Jubilaum und wie immer mussen die passionierten Rennradfahrer die Strecke mit unglaublichen 5.500 Hohenmetern und 238 Kilometern Distanz meistern, die von Solden uber 4 Alpenpasse fuhrt nach Sudtirol und wieder zuruck.

programme.title: E-Tour du Mont-Blanc 2021
programme.desc: The route of the MTB multi-stage event Tour du Mont Blanc (E-TMB) leads around Europes highest mountain - a breathtaking Alpine backdrop. 12,000 meters ascent and 16,000 meters descent over a distance of 300 km.

programme.title: EngadinWind - IQ Foil World Championships

programme.desc: laska has always been a dream-riding destination for 28-year-old American mountain biker Andrew Taylor. But being over 3,000 miles away from his hometown Santa Cruz, it seemed a bit too far to just jump in the truck and go.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Kite Park League World Championships – Hood River (USA) – Best Of
programme.desc: The moment many people have been waiting for is finally here - one of the biggest kiteboarding events. While there are many great kiteboarding locations around the globe, perhaps one of the most historic is Hood River, Oregon, the birthplace of parkriding.

programme.title: FIA Championship Middle East - Saudi Baja Hall
programme.desc: The Saudi Baja is an important event in the FIA Middle East Baja Cup series. It takes place from January 30 to February 1, 2025 and serves as the opening round of the FIA World Cup for Cross-Country Bajas and the FIM Bajas World Cup.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - 52min Highlight Show
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is a motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. With world-class drivers and riders, participants tackle challenging dunes and rugged terrain.

programme.title: Golden Roof Challenge 2021
programme.desc: The Golden Roof Challenge has a great tradition and takes place right in the heart of Innsbruck. The world elite in these sports are invited to the pole vault and long jump competition.

programme.title: King of the Court - Hamburg (GER)
programme.desc: Its a big announcement for beach volleyball fans around the world that Hamburg is hosting its first King of the Court tournament. 20 German and 20 international teams per gender are fighting for the titles “Queens” and “Kings of Hamburg”.

programme.title: FIA Karting Grand Prix - World Championship
programme.desc: Karting is the best for future car champions and is also practiced by enthusiasts who dedicate all their energy to it. The FIA ​​Karting Championships are open to drivers aged 12 and over and there is no upper age limit.

programme.title: Trans Napoli - A Mountain Bike Expedition Naples (ITA)
programme.desc: TransNapoli is an urban MTB adventure led by legendary mountain bike pioneer Hans Rey. It is a colorful five-day tour that crosses the Amalfi and Naples regions of Italy on mountain bikes and e-bikes.

programme.title: Climbing Special - Worldwide
programme.desc: Kashmir, the Moab Desert, the famous Matterhorn, icefalls in Norway and Patagonia. We look back on breathtaking adventures, incredible alpine records and never-before-imagined new ascents

programme.title: Expedition Antarctica - Caro North - Antarctic
programme.desc: Ice climbing, ski mountaineering and days of sailing on open waters through the infamous Drake Passage: 28-year-old extreme athlete Caro North set off for a four-week expedition to the far south of our continent.

programme.desc: Nach einem spannenden Mai, in dem die Sand Series Gran Canaria Classic und die Beach Tennis World Championships in zwei aufeinanderfolgenden Wochen stattfanden, reisen die Spielerinnen nach Brasilien zur dritten Ausgabe der Sand Series Brasilia Classic.

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour - Vieste (ITA)
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge besuchen wir die European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 im italienischen Vieste. Die Windsurfer werden ihr Konnen auf dem Wasser zeigen und uns ein wenig Wassersport-Action auf dem Mittelmeer bieten.

programme.title: WES E-Bike World Series #1 and #2
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge werfen wir einen Blick auf die erste und zweite Runde der World E-Bike Series 2023 in Monaco und Bologna, Italien. Aber wer kann die Rennen der Manner und Frauen gewinnen? Lasst es uns herausfinden!

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Mid Season Recap
programme.desc: Die ersten Events der European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 sind vorbei und wir werfen einen Blick zuruck auf die besten Windsurfer der Welt und ihre epischen Tricks auf dem Wasser.

programme.title: Profile Marko Grilc
programme.desc: Diese Folge widmen wir dem legendaren Snowboarder Marko Grilc. Sei dabei, wenn wir das Leben und die Leistungen dieser Ikone der Snowboardwelt feiern. Macht euch bereit fur eine herzliche Reise durch das bemerkenswerte Vermachtnis von Marko Grilc.

programme.title: 2025 Formula Wing European Championships - Live delayed
programme.desc: The 2025 Formula Wing European Championships will bring together the continents best wingfoil athletes for a week of thrilling high-speed racing. Competitors will compete against each other in dynamic races against a breathtaking backdrop

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: SSL Gold Cup
programme.desc: Final Series 2023 - World Class Sailing - SSL Gold Cup 2023Der SSL Gold Cup ist eine spannende Ausscheidungsserie und wird auf den Kanarischen Inseln ausgetragen. Die 24 besten Nationen der SSL-Rangliste und 16 Nationen aus der Qualifikationsserie nehmen daran teil.

programme.title: WHY WE FLY
programme.desc: Ever wondered what goes through someone’s mind as they jump from a helicopter above the Canadian Rockies? Then ride along with the Team KAVU athletes as they wingsuit, skydive, and speedride above scenic Fernie, British Columbia.

programme.title: Reconnect Two - USA
programme.desc: Today we continue our North American Odyssey with Sarka Pancochova and Cheryl Maas in Reconnect Two. From Mt Baker and the legendary Bank Slalom to backcountry kickers in Bend get ready for the full Pacific Northwest snowboard experience.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - 52min Highlight Show
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is a motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. With world-class drivers and riders, participants tackle challenging dunes and rugged terrain.

programme.title: Episode 36
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 36

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Dakhla (MAR) - Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 will take place in Dakhla. This Moroccan hotspot is known for its constant winds and breathtaking lagoon and offers perfect conditions for exciting freestyle performances.

programme.title: Motorsurf World Championship #1
programme.desc: Motorsurf World Championship #1 - Fujairah (UAE) You’ve probably asked yourself many times what to do if you want to surf but the swell isn’t good enough. The athletes from the Motosurf World Championship have the answer. So let´s check out how they performed in Fujairah.

programme.title: Defender GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sylt (GER) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Stopover of the kite surfing discipline on the Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour in Sylt, Germany. The Defender GKA Kite World Cup Sylt is held in two disciplines - Kite-Surf and Hydrofoil Big Air.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Cape Verde hosts the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the world’s best kite-surfers. Athletes from around the globe compete for the title, showcasing impressive skills in wave-riding and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Cauipe (BRA)
programme.desc: The Cauipe lagoon is the venue for the Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, which brings together the best freestyle kiteboarders in the world. The Brazilian paradise offers the perfect playground for explosive tricks.

programme.title: Actionclip SSE22 SUI Stage4 BestOf
programme.desc: Actionclip SSE22 SUI Stage4 BestOf

programme.title: Swiss Epic
programme.desc: The Swiss Epic will take place from August 17th to 21st, 2021. The race runs over 327 kilometers from St. Moritz to La Prese in Valposchiavo and ends in Davos. Teams familiar with racing in Graubunden know how much the canton has to offer climbers.

programme.title: EngadinWind - Overall Summary
programme.desc: For almost two weeks the lake Silvaplana in the wonderful valley of the Engadine will be the place to be for the international windsurf elite.

programme.title: Signs of Doom, Part 1
programme.desc: The King of the Netherworld arises from B.A.D. and approaches New Domino City. Rex Goodwin, who tries to use the powers of both a Signer and a Dark Signer to become a God, engages in a Turbo Duel with Yusei, Jack and Crow.

programme.title: Signs of Doom, Part 2
programme.desc: The Duel between Yusei, Jack, Crow, and Rex Goodwin continues. Rex Summons "Earthbound Immortal Wiraqocha Rasca" and uses its effect to reduce Crows Life Points to 1. Due to massive injuries, Crow is unable to continue the Duel after falling off his Duel Runner.

programme.title: Signs of Doom, Part 3
programme.desc: Due to the effect of "Wiraqocha Rasca", Jack is blasted from the Duel. Now, only Yusei can save the world from Goodwin and stop the King of the Netherworld from reaching New Domino City.

programme.title: Go With the Flow - Part 1
programme.desc: In Heartland, Yuma Tsukumo aspires to be the worlds best Duelist. Despite this, he is not a good Duelist. When he ends up Dueling, Shark, a student known to have pro-level skills, odd things begin to happen and Yumas story begins.

programme.title: Go With the Flow - Part 2
programme.desc: The Duel between Yuma and Ryoga comes to its conclusion. In order to take down "Leviathan Dragon", Yuma obtains a "Number" monster of his own, "Utopia".

programme.title: In the End - Part 1
programme.desc: Astrals been unable to leave since Yuma Dueled Shark, so, despite his reluctance, hes begun living with Yuma. At an inconvenient time, Akari Tsukumo has trouble when her PC she uses as a stay-at-home reporter crashes. When her big scoop is deleted as a result of a system down the city suffered, she orders Yuma to find an alternate scoop she can use for another manuscript. When Yuma goes into town, the traffic lights go nuts, causing downtown to fall into chaos. Yuma looks for the criminal who spread the computer virus that caused all this chaos.

programme.title: In the End - Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma challenges Professor Kitano, who is behind it all. Professor Kitano notes that each time he reduces his opponents Life Points with "Electronic Computer-Beast Tera Byte" Astrals body weakens, causing him to slowly vanish! To make things worse, the Explosive Virus Time Bomb Ukyo has set is slowly reaching its countdown.

programme.title: Flipping Out - Part 1
programme.desc: A strange shadow approaches Yuma, which turns out to be Tokunosuke Omoteura, a classmate of Yumas known for his duplicitous tongue. In the morning, Yuma was reprimanded for a prank he pulled in front of the whole class that he has no memory of causing. As a result, hes been cut off from every one else. Tokunosuke gently says "Lets Duel". With "Baby Tragon" his new Xyz Monster, Yuma might enjoy this duel, but Tokunosuke seems to be planning something.

programme.title: Flipping Out - Part 2
programme.desc: Tokunosuke steals Yumas "Utopia", causing Astral to vanish. Tokunosuke wanted the great power of Numbers, and Yuma tries to Summon "Leviathan Dragon" to fight back, but Tokunosukes Trap Card takes even that away. When Yuma is pushed into a corner with his field, an unexpected monster will become the Trump Card of the Duel.

programme.title: The Sparrow - Part 1
programme.desc: After having been around a while and having to work with Yuma, Astrals been fascinated by a TV Show Hero named "Different Dimension ESPer Robin". For some reason, Astral feels close and similar to this Robin from an alternate universe. One day, pictures show up with Robin in a fight downtown! Yuma, prodded by Astral, goes with Kotori to where the autographs were taken and meets Robins actor, a kid named Fuya! But Fuya is a timid boy who doesnt resemble the Robin they all admire in the slightest.

programme.title: The Sparrow - Part 2
programme.desc: The mysterious person posing as Robin around town was Fuya. Under the intolerable strain of being a hero, Fuyas heart has been overcome by darkness Yuma challenges him to a Duel to save his soul. Robin, however, possesses "Number 83: Galaxy Queen". With it, he proceeds to summon one character after another from the TV Show. At first, Yuma and Astral were amused by this, but due to Galaxy Queens almighty Monster Effect, they quickly grow impatient. To make things worse, Galaxy Queen, who currently possesses Robin, has taken on the appearance of Fuyas mother.

programme.title: A Plan and a Promise - Part 2
programme.desc: Yugo’s in for a bumpy ride as he’s forced to zigzag his way across a duel track that’s been mapped for mayhem by Roget!

programme.desc: Furious over Celinas failure at the Friendship Cup, Roget sends a squad of Sector Security to seize her.

programme.desc: Obelisk Force has invaded New Domino City to capture Zuzu and Celina! Can Yuya and his friends stop this unstoppable force?

programme.desc: Barrett has returned to snatch Celina back to Duel Academy – unless the Lancers can stop him!

programme.title: Chain Game
programme.desc: Barrett has chained up Yuya and his monsters! Can Yuya break his shackles before Barrett breaks away with Celina?

programme.title: Tragic Reunion
programme.desc: Yuya’s battle with Barrett comes to a shocking conclusion when a mind-controlled madman drops into their duel!

programme.title: Road Rage - Part 1
programme.desc: It’s Jack’s most dangerous duel ever as he takes on Roget’s maniacal minion - Sergey!

programme.title: Road Rage - Part 2
programme.desc: Can Jack Atlas best Sergey, when Sergey combines the best of man and machine?

programme.desc: The Friendship Cup finale is finally here! Jack and Yuya square off to see who will become New Domino City’s newest champion!

programme.title: Making it Mine

programme.title: (MUSIC VIDEO) Naiyo Lagda
programme.desc: (MUSIC VIDEO) Naiyo Lagda

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E271 King of Hearts S1 E271
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E271 Second Chances S1 E271
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E65 Jodha Akbar S3 E65
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the eras wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E271 This is Fate S1 E271
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E271 Undercover Love S1 E271

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E66 Jodha Akbar S3 E66
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the eras wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.
